df-xp
blocks.content: Define the Cartesian product of two classes. This is also sometimes called the "cross product" but that term also has other meanings; we intentionally choose a less ambiguous term. Definition 9.11 of [Quine] p. 64. For example, ` ( { 1 , 5 } X. { 2 , 7 } ) = ` ` ( { <. 1 , 2 >. , <. 1 , 7 >. } u. { <. 5 , 2 >. , <. 5 , 7 >. } ) ` ( ~ ex-xp ). Another example is that the set of rational numbers are defined in ~ df-q using the Cartesian product ` ( ZZ X. NN ) ` ; the left- and right-hand sides of the Cartesian product represent the top (integer) and bottom (natural) numbers of a fraction. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-xp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-rel
blocks.content: Define the relation predicate. Definition 6.4(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23. For alternate definitions, see ~ dfrel2 and ~ dfrel3 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-cnv
blocks.content: Define the converse of a class. Definition 9.12 of [Quine] p. 64. The converse of a binary relation swaps its arguments, i.e., if ` A e. _V ` and ` B e. _V ` then ` ( A ``' R B <-> B R A ) ` , as proven in ~ brcnv (see ~ df-br and ~ df-rel for more on relations). For example, ` ``' { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } = { <. 6 , 2 >. , <. 9 , 3 >. } ` ( ~ ex-cnv ). We use Quine's breve accent (smile) notation. Like Quine, we use it as a prefix, which eliminates the need for parentheses. Many authors use the postfix superscript "minus one". The term "converse" is Quine's terminology; some authors call it "inverse", especially when the argument is a function. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)

blocks.name: df-co
blocks.content: Define the composition of two classes. Definition 6.6(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, ` ( ( exp o. cos ) `` 0 ) = _e ` ( ~ ex-co ) because ` ( cos `` 0 ) = 1 ` (see ~ cos0 ) and ` ( exp `` 1 ) = _e ` (see ~ df-e ). Note that Definition 7 of [Suppes] p. 63 reverses ` A ` and ` B ` , uses ` /. ` instead of ` o. ` , and calls the operation "relative product." (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-co(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccom(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-co(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∘ c1)= { < s0, s1 > | ∃(s2,(s0[c1]s2 ∧ s2[c0]s1))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
}

blocks.name: df-dm
blocks.content: Define the domain of a class. Definition 3 of [Suppes] p. 59. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> dom F = { 2 , 3 } ` ( ~ ex-dm ). Another example is the domain of the complex arctangent, ` ( A e. dom arctan <-> ( A e. CC /\ A =/= -u _i /\ A =/= _i ) ) ` (for proof see ~ atandm ). Contrast with range (defined in ~ df-rn ). For alternate definitions see ~ dfdm2 , ~ dfdm3 , and ~ dfdm4 . The notation " ` dom ` " is used by Enderton; other authors sometimes use script D. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-rn
blocks.content: Define the range of a class. For example, ` F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } -> ran F = { 6 , 9 } ` ( ~ ex-rn ). Contrast with domain (defined in ~ df-dm ). For alternate definitions, see ~ dfrn2 , ~ dfrn3 , and ~ dfrn4 . The notation " ` ran ` " is used by Enderton; other authors sometimes use script R or script W. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-res
blocks.content: Define the restriction of a class. Definition 6.6(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, the expression ` ( exp |`` RR ) ` (used in ~ reeff1 ) means "the exponential function e to the x, but the exponent x must be in the reals" ( ~ df-ef defines the exponential function, which normally allows the exponent to be a complex number). Another example is that ` ( F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } ` ` /\ B = { 1 , 2 } ) -> ( F |`` B ) = { <. 2 , 6 >. } ` ( ~ ex-res ). (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: df-ima
blocks.content: Define the image of a class (as restricted by another class). Definition 6.6(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 24. For example, ` ( F = { <. 2 , 6 >. , <. 3 , 9 >. } /\ B = { 1 , 2 } ) ` ` -> ( F " B ) = { 6 } ` ( ~ ex-ima ). Contrast with restriction ( ~ df-res ) and range ( ~ df-rn ). For an alternate definition, see ~ dfima2 . (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: xpeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c0 × c2)=(c1 × c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c0 × c2), (c1 × c2), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)}, c0 = c1)
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, c0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))
  anbi1d(c0 = c1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2(c0, c1, hs0)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: xpss12
blocks.content: Subset theorem for Cartesian product. Generalization of Theorem 101 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpss12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wss(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3sstr4g(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs1, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  im2anan9(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  ssel(c2, c3, cv(hs1))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpss12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→(c0 × c2)⊆(c1 × c3))
} = {
  3sstr4g((c0 × c2), (c1 × c3), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)}, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs1, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))
  im2anan9(c0 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c3, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c3)
  ssel(c0, c1, hs0)
  ssel(c2, c3, hs1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: xpss
blocks.content: A Cartesian product is included in the ordered pair universe. Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: xpeq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cxp(c2, c0), cxp(c2, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  anbi2d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c0)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xpeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c2 × c0)=(c2 × c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((c2 × c0), (c2 × c1), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)}, c0 = c1)
  opabbidv(hs0, hs1, c0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  anbi2d(c0 = c1, hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  eleq2(c0, c1, hs1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c0)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: elxpi
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. Uses fewer axioms than ~ elxp . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxpi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  elabg(hs0, c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  eqtri(cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
}

blocks.name: elxp
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cxp(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  elopab(s0, s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
}

blocks.name: elxp2
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-2004.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 13-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxp2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

blocks.name: 0nelelxp

  mtbiri(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(emptycls, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

  diff.hs1.w(wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)))

  eqid(< c0, c1 >)

  bitri(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1), w1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)))
  anass(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)
  pm5.32i(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1), w1))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1), w1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0, w1)
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1), w1)
  df-rab(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0)

blocks.name: brxp
blocks.content: Binary relation on a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.)

blocks.name: brrelex12
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the arguments are sets. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex1
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the first argument is a set. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex2
blocks.content: A true binary relation on a relation implies the second argument is a set. (This is a property of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: brrelex12i
blocks.content: Two classes that are related by a binary relation are sets. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: brrelex1i
blocks.content: The first argument of a binary relation exists. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1998.)

blocks.name: brrelex2i
blocks.content: The second argument of a binary relation exists. (An artifact of our ordered pair definition.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: nprrel12
blocks.content: Proper classes are not related via any relation. (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: nprrel
blocks.content: No proper class is related to anything via any relation. (Contributed by Roy F. Longton, 30-Jul-2005.)

blocks.name: 0nelrel0
blocks.content: A binary relation does not contain the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2021.) (Revised by BJ, 14-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: 0nelrel
blocks.content: A binary relation does not contain the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 15-Nov-2021.)

blocks.name: fconstmpt
blocks.content: Representation of a constant function using the mapping operation. (Note that ` x ` cannot appear free in ` B ` .) (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)

thm fconstmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  df-xp(s0, hs0, c0, csn(c1))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm fconstmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 × { c1 })=(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((c0 × { c1 }), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { c1 })}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)})

}

thm vtoclr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  pm2.43i(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  imp(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  syl2im(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c3, universe))
  brrelex12i(c0, c1, c2)
  brrelex2i(c2, c1, c3)
  vtocl2g(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, universe, wi(wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))), wi(wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3))), wi(wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)))
  breq1(cv(s0), c0, c1, cv(s1))
  breq1(cv(s0), c0, c1, c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  breq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(cv(s1), c2, c1, c3)
  vtoclg(s2, c3, universe, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c3), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3))
  breq2(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1), c1)
  breq2(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(c3, universe), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

blocks.pretty:
thm vtoclr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3)
  ⊣ Rel(c1)
  ⊣ ((s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]s2)→ s0[c1]s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  pm2.43i((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3)
  imp(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3, ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  syl2im(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3, ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex12i(c0, c1, c2)
  brrelex2i(c2, c1, c3)
  vtocl2g(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, universe, (c3 ∈ 𝕌 →((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3)), (c3 ∈ 𝕌 →((s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ s0[c1]c3)), (c3 ∈ 𝕌 →((c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3)))
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, c3 ∈ 𝕌, ((s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ s0[c1]c3), ((c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, (s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), s0[c1]c3, (c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3)
  anbi1d(s0 = c0, s0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3, c0[c1]s1)
  breq1(s0, c0, c1, s1)
  breq1(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  imbi2d(s1 = c2, c3 ∈ 𝕌, ((c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3), ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  imbi1d(s1 = c2, (c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3))
  anbi12d(s1 = c2, c0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  breq2(s1, c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(s1, c2, c1, c3)
  vtoclg(s2, c3, universe, ((s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ s0[c1]c3), ((s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]s2)→ s0[c1]s2))
  imbi12d(s2 = c3, (s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]s2), s0[c1]s2, (s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), s0[c1]c3)
  anbi2d(s2 = c3, s0[c1]s1, s1[c1]s2, s1[c1]c3)
  breq2(s2, c3, s1, c1)
  breq2(s2, c3, s0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, c3 ∈ 𝕌, ((c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, (c0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, c1, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, c1, c3)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)

  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.wi.s(s2, (s0[c1]s1 ∧ s1[c1]c3), s0[c1]c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0[c1]s1, s1[c1]c3)

  diff.wbr.s(s2, s1, c1, c3)

  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: opthprc
blocks.content: Justification theorem for an ordered pair definition that works for any classes, including proper classes. This is a possible definition implied by the footnote in [Jech] p. 78, which says, "The sophisticated reader will not object to our use of a pair of classes." (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm opthprc(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  jca(wceq(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqrdv(hs0, c0, c2, wceq(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))))
  3bitr4g(wceq(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls))))))
  eleq2(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cun(cxp(c2, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(csn(emptycls)))), cop(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wo(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls))))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(emptycls, csn(csn(emptycls)))))
  orbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(emptycls, csn(csn(emptycls))))
  mpbiran2(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  opelxp(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, csn(emptycls))
  bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), emptycls), cxp(c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))), wcel(emptycls, csn(csn(emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(emptycls, csn(csn(emptycls)))))
  opelxp(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1, csn(csn(emptycls)))
  bianfi(wcel(emptycls, csn(csn(emptycls))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: brel

blocks.name: elxp3
blocks.content: Membership in a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm elxp3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  elxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  2exbii(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  anbi12i(wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  eqcom(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c1, c2)
}

  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  nfan(s0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  xpeq12d(csn(cv(s0)), c2, csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  exbidv(hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), c0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))

  bitri(wex(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wex(hs1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2))))))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))))
  3bitri(wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c0), cxp(csn(cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))))

  an12(wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))

  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  equcoms(hs1, s0, wceq(c2, csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: xpundi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over union. Theorem 103 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpundi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(cxp(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2)))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, cun(c1, c2))
  eqtr4i(cun(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2)))), cun(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  uneq12i(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  eqtr4i(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2)))), cun(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs1), c1, c2)

thm frsn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→(c0[Fr]{ c1 } ↔ ¬ c1[c0]c1))
} = {
  pm2.61d2(Rel(c0), (c0[Fr]{ c1 } ↔ ¬ c1[c0]c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(Rel(c0), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[Fr]{ c1 } ↔ ¬ c1[c0]c1))
  2thd((Rel(c0)∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), c0[Fr]{ c1 }, ¬ c1[c0]c1)
  adantl(Rel(c0), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fr]{ c1 })
  sylbi(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fr]{ c1 }, { c1 } = ∅)
  snprc(c1)
  mpbiri({ c1 } = ∅, c0[Fr]{ c1 }, c0[Fr]∅)
  fr0(c0)
  freq2({ c1 }, emptycls, c0)
  stoic1a(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c1[c0]c1)
  brrelex1(c0, c1, c1)
  3bitrd(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fr]{ c1 }, ¬ c1[c0]c1, ∃(hs1 ∈ { c1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]c1))
  syl5bb(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fr]{ c1 }, ∃(hs1 ∈ { c1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)), ∀(hs2,((hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)))))
  df-fr(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0, { c1 })
  syl6bb(c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(hs2,((hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)))), ∃(hs1 ∈ { c1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)), ∀(hs2,(hs2 = { c1 } → ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)))))
  albidv(hs2, c1 ∈ 𝕌, ((hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1))), (hs2 = { c1 } → ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1))))
  imbi1d(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅), ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)), hs2 = { c1 })
  impbida(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅), hs2 = { c1 })
  adantl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (hs2 ⊆ { c1 } ∧ hs2 ≠ ∅), hs2 = { c1 })
  imp(hs2 ⊆ { c1 }, hs2 ≠ ∅, hs2 = { c1 })
  sylbb(hs2 ⊆ { c1 }, (hs2 ≠ ∅ → hs2 = { c1 }), (hs2 = ∅ ∨ hs2 = { c1 }))
  sssn(hs2, c1)
  neor(hs2, emptycls, hs2 = { c1 })
  jca((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs2 = { c1 }), hs2 ⊆ { c1 }, hs2 ≠ ∅)
  adantl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs2 = { c1 }, hs2 ⊆ { c1 })
  eqimss(hs2, { c1 })
  imp(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs2 = { c1 }, hs2 ≠ ∅)
  syl5ibrcom(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs2 = { c1 }, hs2 ≠ ∅, { c1 } ≠ ∅)
  snnzg(c1, universe)
  neeq1(hs2, { c1 }, emptycls)
  ceqsalv(hs2, { c1 }, ∃(hs1 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)), ∃(hs1 ∈ { c1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)))
  snex(c1)
  rexeqbi1dv(hs1, hs2, { c1 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs2, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1), ∀(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1))
  raleq(hs0, hs2, { c1 }, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)

blocks.name: elopaelxp

blocks.name: bropaex12
blocks.content: Two classes related by an ordered pair class builder are sets. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jan-2020.)

thm bropaex12(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylib(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c1, copab(s0, s1, w0))
  elopaelxp(s0, s1, cop(c0, c2), w0)
  opelxp(c0, c2, universe, universe)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bropaex12(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1]c2 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  ⊣ c1 = { < s0, s1 > | w0 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylib(c0[c1]c2, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), < c0, c2 > ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(c0[c1]c2, < c0, c2 > ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  bitri(c0[c1]c2, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, < c0, c2 > ∈ c1)
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(< c0, c2 >, c1, { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  elopaelxp(s0, s1, < c0, c2 >, w0)
  opelxp(c0, c2, universe, universe)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: opabssxp
blocks.content: An abstraction relation is a subset of a related Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-1995.)

blocks.name: brab2a
blocks.content: The law of concretion for a binary relation. Ordered pair membership in an ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm brab2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), w0))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  biadanii(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), w0)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstri(c1, cxp(c3, c4), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c4, w1)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c4)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1))))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1))
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)
  eleq2i(cop(c0, c2), c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), w1)))
  opelopab2a(s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, w1, w0)
}

thm brab2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1]c2 ↔((c0 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c4)∧ w0))
  ⊣ ((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2)→(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ c1 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ w1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  biadanii(c0[c1]c2, (c0 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c4), w0)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqsstri(c1, (c3 × c4), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ w1)})
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c3, c4, w1)
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c4), c0[c1]c2, w0, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ w1)})
  bitri(c0[c1]c2, < c0, c2 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ w1)}, < c0, c2 > ∈ c1)
  df-br(c0, c1, c2)

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → w0)
  ⊣ c1 =(c2 × c3)
  ⊣ (< s0, s1 > = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→ w1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)

  elxp3(s0, s1, c0, c2, c3)

  sylbi(< s0, s1 > ∈(c2 × c3), w1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))
  opelxp(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: 0xp
blocks.content: The Cartesian product with the empty set is empty. Part of Theorem 3.13(ii) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0xp(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cxp(emptycls, c0), emptycls)
} = {
  nel0(hs0, cxp(emptycls, c0))
  mtbir(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(emptycls, c0)), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))))
  nex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0)))))
  nex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))))
  mto(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls))
  noel(cv(hs1))
  simprl(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  elxp(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(emptycls, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 0xp(class c0) {
  ⊢ (∅ × c0)= ∅
} = {
  nel0(hs0, (∅ × c0))
  mtbir(hs0 ∈(∅ × c0), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ ∅ ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))))
  nex(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ ∅ ∧ hs2 ∈ c0))))
  nex(hs2, (hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ ∅ ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)))
  mto((hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ ∅ ∧ hs2 ∈ c0)), hs1 ∈ ∅)
  noel(hs1)
  simprl(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, hs1 ∈ ∅, hs2 ∈ c0)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, hs0, emptycls, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((∅ × c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

thm csbxp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))

  eqtri([c0 / s0]{ hs0 | ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2))))}, { hs0 | ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈[c0 / s0]c1 ∧ hs2 ∈[c0 / s0]c2))))}, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2))))})
  csbab(s0, hs0, c0, ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))))
  abbii(hs0, [c0 / s0]∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈[c0 / s0]c1 ∧ hs2 ∈[c0 / s0]c2)))))
  bitri([c0 / s0]∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈[c0 / s0]c1 ∧ hs2 ∈[c0 / s0]c2)))), ∃(hs1,[c0 / s0]∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))))

  bitri([c0 / s0](hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)), (hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈[c0 / s0]c1 ∧ hs2 ∈[c0 / s0]c2)), ([c0 / s0]hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧[c0 / s0](hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2)))
  sbcan(s0, c0, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2))
  pm2.61i((([c0 / s0]hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧[c0 / s0](hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c2))↔(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈[c0 / s0]c1 ∧ hs2 ∈[c0 / s0]c2))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)

  df-xp(hs1, hs2, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2)

thm sbcrel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wrel(c2)), wrel(csb(s0, c0, c2))))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wrel(c2)), wrel(csb(s0, c0, c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(c2, cxp(universe, universe))), wss(csb(s0, c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wss(c2, cxp(universe, universe))), wss(csb(s0, c0, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wss(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, c2, cxp(universe, universe))
  sseq2d(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(universe, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, c1, cxp(universe, universe))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wrel(c2), wss(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df-rel(c2)
  df-rel(csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]Rel(c2)↔ Rel([c0 / s0]c2)))

  sbcssg(s0, c0, c1, c2, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sseq2d([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0](𝕌 × 𝕌), (𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 ∈ c1)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, c1, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, Rel(c2), c2 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-rel(c2)
  df-rel([c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm ssrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→(c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(Rel(c0), c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, c0 ⊆ c1, (< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, < s0, s1 >)
  com12(Rel(c0), ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), c0 ⊆ c1)
  syl6ibr(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), Rel(c0), c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)))
  syl5(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), Rel(c0), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)))))
  sylg(hs0, Rel(c0), (hs0 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >))), (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  sylbb(Rel(c0), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))), c0 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-rel(c0)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  imim2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)))
  sylbi(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)))))
  abeq2i(hs0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)))))
  eqtri((𝕌 × 𝕌), { hs0 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌))))}, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)})
  df-xp(s0, s1, universe, universe)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌))
  2eximi(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)), hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  simpl(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌))
  alimdv(hs0, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), (hs0 ∈ c0 → ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >))), (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1))
  a2d(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), hs0 ∈ c1)
  com23(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)), hs0 ∈ c1)
  sylib(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), (∃(s0, ∃(s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >))→(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > →(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)))))
  2alimi(s0, s1, (< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > →(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)))
  biimprcd((< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1), hs0 = < s0, s1 >, (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, < s0, s1 > ∈ c0, < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)
  eleq1(hs0, < s0, s1 >, c0)
  eleq1(hs0, < s0, s1 >, c1)
  19.23vv(s0, s1, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))))
  diff.wi.s(s0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: eqrel
blocks.content: Extensionality principle for relations. Theorem 3.2(ii) of [Monk1] p. 33. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wrel(c0), wrel(c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))))
  bi2anan9(wrel(c0), wrel(c1), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, c1, c0)
  eqss(c0, c1)
  2albiim(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
}

  bitri(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2)))))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  elxp2(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c3)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3)))))
  diff.wi.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: relssi
blocks.content: Inference from subclass principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm relssi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, wss(c0, c1), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ax-gen(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relssi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
  ⊣ Rel(c0)
  ⊣ (< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  mpgbir(s0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)))
  ax-mp((c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)))), Rel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  ax-gen(s1, (< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 → < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))
}

thm relssdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  syl(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0))
  ssrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: eqrelriiv
blocks.content: Inference from extensionality principle for relations. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqrelriiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  mp2an(wceq(c0, c1), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  eqrelriv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqrelriiv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 = c1
  ⊣ Rel(c0)

  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)

  eqrelriv(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

}

blocks.name: eqrelrdv
blocks.content: Deduce equality of relations from equivalence of membership. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 10-Oct-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqrelrdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wrel(c1)
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wrel(c0), wrel(c1))
  eqrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqrelrdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ Rel(c0)
  ⊣ Rel(c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 ↔ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 = c1, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 ↔ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, w0, (< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 ↔ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))
  mp2an((c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 ↔ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)))), Rel(c0), Rel(c1))
  eqrel(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

} = {

blocks.content: A subclass relationship determined by ordered triples. Use ~ relrelss to express the antecedent in terms of the relation predicate. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2008.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssrelrel(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  impbid2(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(c0, c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, wss(c0, c1), wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))
  alrimiv(s2, wss(c0, c1), wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1)))
  ssel(c0, c1, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  com12(wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))), wss(c0, c1))
  3imtr4g(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))), wss(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(c0, c1), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  alimdv(hs0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c1))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))

blocks.name: elrel
blocks.content: A member of a relation is an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: rel0
blocks.content: The empty set is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.)

blocks.name: nrelv
blocks.content: The universal class is not a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: relsng
blocks.content: A singleton is a relation iff it is a singleton on an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2013.) (Revised by BJ, 12-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: relsnb
blocks.content: An at-most-singleton is a relation iff it is empty (because it is a "singleton on a proper class") or it is a singleton of an ordered pair. (Contributed by BJ, 26-Feb-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm relsnb(class c0) {
  |- wb(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
} = {
  impbii(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  sylib(wrel(csn(c0)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  biimpcd(wrel(csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  relsng(c0, universe)
  imor(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  jaoi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)))
  sylbi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  mpbiri(wceq(csn(c0), emptycls), wrel(csn(c0)), wrel(emptycls))
  rel0()
  releq(csn(c0), emptycls)
  ibir(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(csn(c0)))
  relsng(c0, cxp(universe, universe))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relsnb(class c0) {
  ⊢ (Rel({ c0 })↔(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∨ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
} = {
  impbii(Rel({ c0 }), (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∨ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  sylib(Rel({ c0 }), (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∨ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  biimpcd(Rel({ c0 }), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  relsng(c0, universe)
  imor(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  jaoi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), Rel({ c0 }))
  sylbi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, Rel({ c0 }), { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  mpbiri({ c0 } = ∅, Rel({ c0 }), Rel(∅))
  rel0()
  releq({ c0 }, emptycls)
  ibir(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), Rel({ c0 }))
  relsng(c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
}

blocks.name: copsex2ga
blocks.content: Implicit substitution inference for ordered pairs. Compare ~ copsex2g . (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)

thm copsex2ga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseli(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe))
  xpss(c1, c2)
  baibr(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))

blocks.pretty:
thm copsex2ga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1 × c2)→(w0 ↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))))
  ⊣ (c0 = < s0, s1 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(c1 × c2), (w0 ↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))), c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sseli(c0, (c1 × c2), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  xpss(c1, c2)
  baibr(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), w0, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))))
  copsex2gb(s0, s1, c0, w1, w0)
}

blocks.name: unixpss

blocks.name: relun

blocks.name: relin1

blocks.name: reldif

blocks.name: reliun

blocks.name: reliin
blocks.content: An indexed intersection is a relation if at least one of the member of the indexed family is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: reluni
blocks.content: The union of a class is a relation iff any member is a relation. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: relint
blocks.content: The intersection of a class is a relation if at least one member is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: relopabiv
blocks.content: A class of ordered pairs is a relation. For a version without disjoint variable condition, but a longer proof using ~ ax-13 , see ~ relopabi . (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jul-2023.)

  eximi(s1, ∃(s0, ∃(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >)), hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylibr(∃(s0, ∃(hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >)), hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌)))))
  2eximi(s0, hs1, hs0 = < s0, hs1 >, (hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌)))

  abeq2i(hs0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌)))))
  eqtri((𝕌 × 𝕌), { hs0 | ∃(s0, ∃(hs1,(hs0 = < s0, hs1 > ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌))))}, { < s0, hs1 > |(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌)})
  df-xp(s0, hs1, universe, universe)
  df-opab(s0, hs1, hs0, (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ 𝕌))
  ax5e(s1, hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 × 𝕌))

thm relopabiALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {

} = {

  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  abssi(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(universe, universe)))
  opelvv(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(universe, universe))
  df-rel(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe))

blocks.name: relopab
blocks.content: A class of ordered pairs is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-1995.) Remove disjoint variable conditions. (Revised by Alan Sare, 9-Jul-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: mptrel
blocks.content: The maps-to notation always describes a relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: reli
blocks.content: The identity relation is a relation. Part of Exercise 4.12(p) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: rele
blocks.content: The membership relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-1998.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: opabid2

thm opabid2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  gen2(hs0, hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  opelopab(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c0))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  opeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))

  opeq2(cv(s1), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  mpan(wrel(c0), wb(wceq(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), c0), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))

  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)))

  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→ { < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ∈ c0 } = c0)

} = {

  relopab(s0, s1, < s0, s1 > ∈ c0)
  eqrel(hs0, hs1, { < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ∈ c0 }, c0)

thm inopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1)))

} = {

  relin1(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
  relopab(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, w1))))
  3bitr4ri(wa(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, w1))), wsb(hs1, s1, wa(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, w1))), wa(wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w1))))
  sban(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, w1))
  sbbii(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, w1)), wa(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, w1)))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, w1)
  anbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1)), wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wsb(hs1, s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w1)))
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, w0)
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, w1)
  elin(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, wa(w0, w1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)

  sban(hs1, s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]w1)

  sbcan(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)))
  sbcbii(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wn(w1))), wa(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))))
  sbcan(s1, cv(hs1), w0, wn(w1))
  anbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))))
  elv(hs0, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))), wn(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1)))))
  sbcng(s0, cv(hs0), universe, wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))

  elv(hs1, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), wn(w1)), wn(wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1))))
  sbcng(s1, cv(hs1), universe, w1)
  notbii(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wsbc(s1, cv(hs1), w1)))
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w1)
  eldif(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s0, s1, wa(w0, wn(w1))))

thm difopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 })= { < s0, s1 > |(w0 ∧ ¬ w1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, ({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }), { < s0, s1 > |(w0 ∧ ¬ w1)})
  ax-mp(Rel(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 })), Rel({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)
  reldif({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }, { < s0, s1 > | w1 })
  relopab(s0, s1, (w0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  3bitr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > |(w0 ∧ ¬ w1)}, (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 } ∧ ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }), [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1](w0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  3bitr4ri((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 } ∧ ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }), [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1](w0 ∧ ¬ w1), [hs0 / s0]([hs1 / s1]w0 ∧[hs1 / s1]¬ w1), ([hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w0 ∧[hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]¬ w1))
  sbcan(s0, hs0, [hs1 / s1]w0, [hs1 / s1]¬ w1)
  sbcbii(s0, hs0, [hs1 / s1](w0 ∧ ¬ w1), ([hs1 / s1]w0 ∧[hs1 / s1]¬ w1))
  sbcan(s1, hs1, w0, ¬ w1)
  anbi12i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }, [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w0, [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]¬ w1)
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, w0)
  3bitr4ri(¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }, [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]¬ w1, [hs0 / s0]¬[hs1 / s1]w1, ¬[hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w1)
  elv(hs0, ([hs0 / s0]¬[hs1 / s1]w1 ↔ ¬[hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w1))
  sbcng(s0, hs0, universe, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  sbcbii(s0, hs0, [hs1 / s1]¬ w1, ¬[hs1 / s1]w1)
  elv(hs1, ([hs1 / s1]¬ w1 ↔ ¬[hs1 / s1]w1))
  sbcng(s1, hs1, universe, w1)
  notbii(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }, [hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]w1)
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, w1)
  eldif(< hs0, hs1 >, { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, { < s0, s1 > | w1 })
  opelopabsb(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, (w0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }))
  diff.hs0.c({ < s0, s1 > |(w0 ∧ ¬ w1)})
  diff.hs1.c(({ < s0, s1 > | w0 } \ { < s0, s1 > | w1 }))
  diff.hs1.c({ < s0, s1 > |(w0 ∧ ¬ w1)})
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: inxp
blocks.content: The intersection of two Cartesian products. Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm inxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3)), cin(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)))))
  eqtri(cin(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))))
  inopab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3))))
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  an4(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c1, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  elin(cv(hs1), c1, c3)
  ineq12i(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c3)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c1, c3))
}

thm inxp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c1)⋂(c2 × c3))=((c0 ⋂ c2)×(c1 ⋂ c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(((c0 × c1)⋂(c2 × c3)), ((c0 ⋂ c2)×(c1 ⋂ c3)), ({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)} ⋂ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)}), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)∧ hs1 ∈(c1 ⋂ c3))})
  eqtri(({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)} ⋂ { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)}), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)∧ hs1 ∈(c1 ⋂ c3))}, { < hs0, hs1 > |((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))})
  inopab(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)∧ hs1 ∈(c1 ⋂ c3)))
  bitr4i(((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)∧ hs1 ∈(c1 ⋂ c3)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)))
  an4(hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c3)
  anbi12i(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2), hs1 ∈(c1 ⋂ c3), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))
  elin(hs0, c0, c2)
  elin(hs1, c1, c3)
  ineq12i((c0 × c1), (c2 × c3), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)}, { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)})
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c2, c3)
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, (c0 ⋂ c2), (c1 ⋂ c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c0 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ c3))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 ⋂ c3))
}

blocks.name: xpindi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over intersection. Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: xpindir
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over intersection. Similar to Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: xpiindi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over indexed intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm xpiindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpancom(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wrel(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))))
  jctil(wne(c0, emptycls), wrel(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))))
  syl(wne(c0, emptycls), wrel(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wrex(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))))
  mpan2(wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2)))
  relxp(c1, c2)
  r19.2z(s0, c0, wrel(cxp(c1, c2)))
  reliin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  relxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  3bitr4g(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2))))
  3bitr4g(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  bicomd(wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  r19.28zv(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  elv(hs1, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), ciin(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))
  eliin(s0, cv(hs1), universe, c0, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c2)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe))
  opex(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eliin(s0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, ciin(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(ciin(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.hs1.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm xpiindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ ∅ →(c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))= ⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpancom(c0 ≠ ∅, (c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))= ⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)), (Rel((c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))∧ Rel(⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)))))
  jctil(c0 ≠ ∅, Rel((c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))), Rel(⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2))))
  syl(c0 ≠ ∅, Rel(⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, Rel((c1 × c2))))
  mpan2(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, Rel((c1 × c2))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Rel((c1 × c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c0, Rel((c1 × c2)))
  relxp(c1, c2)
  r19.2z(s0, c0, Rel((c1 × c2)))
  reliin(s0, c0, (c1 × c2))
  relxp(c1, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, (c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), ⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)), c0 ≠ ∅)
  3bitr4g(c0 ≠ ∅, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c2)))
  3bitr4g(c0 ≠ ∅, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c2)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)))
  bicomd(c0 ≠ ∅, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)))
  r19.28zv(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2))
  elv(hs1, (hs1 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c2)))
  eliin(s0, hs1, universe, c0, c2)
  ralbii(s0, c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c2), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2))
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, c1, c2)
  opelxp(hs0, hs1, c1, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  ax-mp((< hs0, hs1 > ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c2))), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(hs0, hs1)
  eliin(s0, < hs0, hs1 >, universe, c0, (c1 × c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 × ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 × c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: xpriindi
blocks.content: Distributive law for Cartesian product over relativized indexed intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpriindi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61ine(c2, emptycls, wceq(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)))))
  eqtr4d(cxp(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))), cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))), cxp(c0, c1), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  xpeq2d(c0, cin(c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), c1, wceq(c2, emptycls))

  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, c3)
  0iin(s0, c3)
  inv1(c1)
  syl6eq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3))), cxp(c0, c1), cin(cxp(c0, c1), universe), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  ineq2d(cxp(c0, c1), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), universe, wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6eq(ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), universe, ciin(s0, emptycls, cxp(c0, c3)), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  iineq1(s0, c2, emptycls, cxp(c0, c3))

  xpindi(c0, c1, ciin(s0, c2, c3))
  ineq2d(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), ciin(s0, c2, cxp(c0, c3)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  xpiindi(s0, c2, c0, c3)

}

blocks.name: eliunxp

thm eliunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

} = {
  3bitr2i(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))), wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  mpbir(wrel(ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wral(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  rgenw(s0, c1, wrel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  relxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)
  reliun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  elrel(s0, s1, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), c0)
  19.41(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  nfel2(s0, c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))
  nfiu1(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  exbii(s0, wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))))
  bitr3i(wa(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))))
  19.41v(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))
  exbii(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  pm5.32i(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))))

thm opeliunxp2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  pm5.21nii(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(c0, universe))

  elex(c0, c2)
  vtoclg1f(s0, c0, universe, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))), wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3))))
  nfbi(s0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  nfel2(s0, cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)))
  nfiu1(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))
  nfv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4)))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(s0), c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c3)), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  eleq2d(c1, c3, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  opeliunxp(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c4))
