blocks.name: raliunxp
blocks.content: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ ralxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm raliunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))))
  albii(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))))
  bitr4i(wi(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))), wi(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))), w0))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  eliunxp(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  19.23vv(s1, s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)))))
  alrot3(s0, s1, s2, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0))
  2albii(s1, s2, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0))))
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)))
  impexp(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0)
  ceqsalv(s0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1))
  opex(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0)
  r2al(s1, s2, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)

blocks.name: rexiunxp
blocks.content: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ rexxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexiunxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))))
  notbii(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))))
  bitri(wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1))))
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  ralbii(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  ralnex(s2, c1, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s2, w0)
}

blocks.name: ralxp
blocks.content: Universal quantification restricted to a Cartesian product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification. The hypothesis specifies an implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, csn(cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(∀(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1)), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ∈ c0,({ s1 } × c1)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c0,({ s1 } × c1)), (c0 × c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  raliunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, ({ s1 } × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, { s1 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rexxp
blocks.content: Existential quantification restricted to a Cartesian product is equivalent to a double restricted quantification. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3i(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), w0))
  rexeqi(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  rexiunxp(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, csn(cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

  rexeqi(s0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c0,({ s1 } × c1)), (c0 × c1), w0)

blocks.name: exopxfr
blocks.content: Transfer ordered-pair existence from/to single variable existence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm exopxfr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitri(wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)), wrex(s1, universe, wrex(s2, universe, w1)), wex(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1)))
  rexxp(s0, s1, s2, universe, universe, w0, w1)
  rexv(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1))
  exbii(s1, wrex(s2, universe, w1), wex(s2, w1))
  rexv(s2, w1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm exopxfr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), w0)↔ ∃(s1, ∃(s2, w1)))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitri(∃(s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), w0), ∃(s1, ∃(s2, w1)), ∃(s1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s2 ∈ 𝕌, w1)), ∃(s1, ∃(s2 ∈ 𝕌, w1)))
  rexxp(s0, s1, s2, universe, universe, w0, w1)
  rexv(s1, ∃(s2 ∈ 𝕌, w1))
  exbii(s1, ∃(s2 ∈ 𝕌, w1), ∃(s2, w1))
  rexv(s2, w1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}

thm exopxfr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6bb(wrel(c0), wrex(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1))), wrex(s0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  rexbidv2(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe), wrel(c0), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  pm4.71rd(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  adantrd(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseld(cv(s0), c0, cxp(universe, universe), wrel(c0))
  biimpi(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df-rel(c0)
  exopxfr(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1)
  eleq1(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), w1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm exopxfr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→(∃(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(< s1, s2 > ∈ c0 ∧ w1)))))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  rexbidv2(s0, c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), Rel(c0), w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  pm4.71rd(Rel(c0), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0), s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  adantrd(Rel(c0), s0 ∈ c0, w0, s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sseld(s0, c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), Rel(c0))
  biimpi(Rel(c0), c0 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-rel(c0)
  exopxfr(s0, s1, s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0), (< s1, s2 > ∈ c0 ∧ w1))

blocks.name: djussxp
blocks.content: Disjoint union is a subset of a Cartesian product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: ralxpf
blocks.content: Version of ~ ralxp with bound-variable hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(wral(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1)), wral(hs1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs2, c1, wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))))
  ralbii(hs1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)), wral(hs2, c1, wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))))
  cbvralsv(s2, hs2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  cbvral(s1, hs1, c0, wral(s2, c1, w1), wral(s2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))
  nfv(hs1, wral(s2, c1, w1))
  nfral(s1, s2, c1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  ralbidv(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), w1, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  ralxp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))
  sylbi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  eqvinop(s1, s2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  exlimi(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))))
  nfbi(s1, wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfsb(s1, hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  nfs1v(s1, hs1, w1)
  exlimi(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wb(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))))
  nfbi(s2, wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))
  nfsb(s2, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfs1v(s2, hs2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)), w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0, w1)
  sylbi(wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wb(w1, wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs2))))
  opth(cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs2)), w1, wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)), wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  sbequ12(s1, hs1, w1)
  sbequ12(s2, hs2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.w(wsb(hs1, s1, w1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s2, c1, w1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wsb(hs2, s2, wsb(hs1, s1, w1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  diff.hs2.w(wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1)), ∀(hs0 ∈(c0 × c1),[hs0 / s0]w0))
  cbvralsv(s0, hs0, (c0 × c1), w0)
  3bitr4ri(∀(hs0 ∈(c0 × c1),[hs0 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s1]w1)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)))
  ralbii(hs1, c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s1]w1), ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  cbvralsv(s2, hs2, c1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  cbvral(s1, hs1, c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s2 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfv(hs1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1, w1))
  nfral(s1, s2, c1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  ralbidv(s2, c1, s1 = hs1, w1, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  ralxp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  sylbi(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, ([hs0 / s0]w0 ↔[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1), ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >))))
  eqvinop(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  exlimi(s1, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >)), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ↔[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfbi(s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfsb(s1, hs2, s2, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfs1v(s1, hs1, w1)
  exlimi(s2, (hs0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ↔[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1))
  nfbi(s2, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1)
  nfsb(s2, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfs1v(s2, hs2, [hs1 / s1]w1)
  sylan9bb(hs0 = < s1, s2 >, < s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >, [hs0 / s0]w0, [hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1, w1)
  sbhypf(hs0, s0, < s1, s2 >, w0, w1)
  sylbi(< s1, s2 > = < hs1, hs2 >, (w1 ↔[hs2 / s2][hs1 / s1]w1), (s1 = hs1 ∧ s2 = hs2))

  vex(s1)

blocks.name: rexxpf
blocks.content: Version of ~ rexxp with bound-variable hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))))
  notbii(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))))
  bitri(wral(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wn(w0)), wral(s1, c0, wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1))))
  ralxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s2, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  ralbii(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wn(w1)), wn(wrex(s2, c1, w1)))
  ralnex(s2, c1, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1))
}

blocks.name: iunxpf
blocks.content: Indexed union on a Cartesian product equals a double indexed union. The hypothesis specifies an implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wnfc(s2, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))), wrex(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  rexxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wrex(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, c1, c3))))
  eliun(s1, cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s2, c1, c3)), wrex(s2, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  eliun(s2, cv(hs0), c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s1, c0, ciun(s2, c1, c3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iunxpf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ⋃(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), c2)= ⋃(s1 ∈ c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3))
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), c2), ⋃(s1 ∈ c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3)))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), c2), hs0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ∈ c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3)), ∃(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3)))
  rexxpf(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c3)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  eliun(s0, hs0, (c0 × c1), c2)
  bitri(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ∈ c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3)), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3)), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3)))
  eliun(s1, hs0, c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3))
  rexbii(s1, c0, hs0 ∈ ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3), ∃(s2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3))
  eliun(s2, hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s1 ∈ c0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c1, c3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: opabbi2dv
blocks.content: Deduce equality of a relation and an ordered-pair class builder. Compare ~ abbi2dv . (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabbi2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, w1)))
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr(c0, copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  opabid2(s0, s1, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabbi2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = { < s0, s1 > | w1 })
  ⊣ Rel(c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(< s0, s1 > ∈ c0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr(c0, { < s0, s1 > | w1 }, { < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ∈ c0 }, w0)
  ax-mp({ < s0, s1 > | < s0, s1 > ∈ c0 } = c0, Rel(c0))
  opabid2(s0, s1, c0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, < s0, s1 > ∈ c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: ideqg
blocks.content: For sets, the identity relation is the same as equality. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ideqg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cid, c0), wceq(c2, c0)))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cid, c0), wceq(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  anim12ci(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cid, c0), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
  brrelex1i(c2, cid, c0)
  reli()
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  elexd(c2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0)))
  biimparc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, c1))
  eleq1(c2, c0, c1)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cid, wceq(c2, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c2, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c2, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c2, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ideqg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[=]c0 ↔ c2 = c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2[=]c0, c2 = c0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  anim12ci(c0 ∈ c1, c2[=]c0, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  id(c0 ∈ c1)
  brrelex1i(c2, cid, c0)
  reli()
  jca((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 = c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  elexd(c2, c1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 = c0))
  biimparc(c0 ∈ c1, c2 = c0, c2 ∈ c1)
  eleq1(c2, c0, c1)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 = c0)
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cid, c2 = c0, hs0 = hs1, c2 = hs1)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, hs1)
  eqeq2(hs1, c0, c2)
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(c2 = c0)
}

thm coss1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(ccom(c0, c2), ccom(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3sstr4g(ccom(c0, c2), ccom(c1, c2), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wss(c0, c1))
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs2, wss(c0, c1), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  eximdv(hs1, wss(c0, c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))
  anim2d(wss(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))
  ssbr(c0, c1, cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm coss1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c0 ∘ c2)⊆(c1 ∘ c2))
} = {
  3sstr4g((c0 ∘ c2), (c1 ∘ c2), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))}, c0 ⊆ c1)
  ssopab2dv(hs0, hs2, c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)))
  eximdv(hs1, c0 ⊆ c1, (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))
  anim2d(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0[c2]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, hs1[c1]hs2)
  ssbr(c0, c1, hs1, hs2)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs2.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: eqbrrdva
blocks.content: Deduction from extensionality principle for relations, given an equivalence only on the relation domain and range. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqbrrdva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cxp(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqbrrdv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  sylibr(w0, wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6ss(c0, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  df-rel(c0)
  sylibr(w0, wrel(c1), wss(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6ss(c1, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  xpss(c2, c3)
  df-rel(c1)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  syl6ib(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(s1)))
  ssbrd(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  syl6ib(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cxp(c2, c3), cv(s1)))
  ssbrd(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1), cxp(c2, c3), w0)
  brxp(cv(s0), c2, c3, cv(s1))
  3expib(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqbrrdva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c2 × c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆(c2 × c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→(s0[c0]s1 ↔ s0[c1]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqbrrdv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  sylibr(w0, Rel(c0), c0 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  syl6ss(c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), (c2 × c3), w0)
  df-rel(c0)
  sylibr(w0, Rel(c1), c1 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  syl6ss(c1, (𝕌 × 𝕌), (c2 × c3), w0)
  xpss(c2, c3)
  df-rel(c1)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, s0[c0]s1, s0[c1]s1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))
  syl6ib(w0, s0[c0]s1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), s0[(c2 × c3)]s1)
  ssbrd(s0, c0, s1, (c2 × c3), w0)
  syl6ib(w0, s0[c1]s1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), s0[(c2 × c3)]s1)
  ssbrd(s0, c1, s1, (c2 × c3), w0)
  brxp(s0, c2, c3, s1)
  3expib(w0, s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3, (s0[c0]s1 ↔ s0[c1]s1))
}

  sbcbr123(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))
  breq12d(csb(s0, c0, cv(hs0)), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wcel(c0, c1))

thm cnvco(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0))))))
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))))
  3bitr4i(wbr(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))))
  exancom(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))
  brco(hs2, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  exbii(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), ccnv(c1), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  brcnv(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))
  vex(hs1)
  brcnv(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs2)
  vex(hs0)
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, ccom(c0, c1))

thm cnvco(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ `'(c0 ∘ c1)=(`' c1 ∘ `' c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(`'(c0 ∘ c1), (`' c1 ∘ `' c0), { < hs1, hs0 > | hs0[(c0 ∘ c1)]hs1 }, { < hs1, hs0 > | ∃(hs2,(hs1[`' c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`' c1]hs0))})
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, hs0[(c0 ∘ c1)]hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs1[`' c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`' c1]hs0)))
  3bitr4i(hs0[(c0 ∘ c1)]hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs1[`' c0]hs2 ∧ hs2[`' c1]hs0)), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c1]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1)), ∃(hs2,(hs2[c0]hs1 ∧ hs0[c1]hs2)))
  exancom(hs2, hs0[c1]hs2, hs2[c0]hs1)

thm dfrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtri(crn(c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), cdm(ccnv(c0)), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))))
  df-rn(c0)
  df-dm(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  exbii(s1, wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

thm dfrn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ran(c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1, s1[c0]s0)}

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtri(ran(c0), { s0 | ∃(s1, s1[c0]s0)}, dom(`' c0), { s0 | ∃(s1, s0[`' c0]s1)})
  df-rn(c0)

  abbii(s0, ∃(s1, s0[`' c0]s1), ∃(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  exbii(s1, s0[`' c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  brcnv(s0, c0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: ssrelrn
blocks.content: If a relation is a subset of a cartesian product, then for each element of the range of the relation there is an element of the first set of the cartesian product which is related to the element of the range by the relation. (Contributed by AV, 24-Oct-2020.)

  sbcel2(s0, c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)

thm eldmg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, c2, cv(s0)))

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cdm(c0), cdm(c1), wss(c0, c1))
  3imtr4g(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)))
  eximdv(hs1, wss(c0, c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c1))

thm opeldmd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  sylibrd(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(c1, c4))
  spcegv(hs0, c1, c4, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))
  eleq1d(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c2, cop(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  opeq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(c0, c3))
  eldm2g(hs0, c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm opeldmd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(< c0, c1 > ∈ c2 → c0 ∈ dom(c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  sylibrd(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈ c2, c0 ∈ dom(c2), ∃(hs0, < c0, hs0 > ∈ c2))
  syl(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈ c2 → ∃(hs0, < c0, hs0 > ∈ c2)), c1 ∈ c4)
  spcegv(hs0, c1, c4, < c0, c1 > ∈ c2, < c0, hs0 > ∈ c2)
  eleq1d(< c0, hs0 >, c2, < c0, c1 >, hs0 = c1)
  opeq2(hs0, c1, c0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ dom(c2)↔ ∃(hs0, < c0, hs0 > ∈ c2)), c0 ∈ c3)
  eldm2g(hs0, c0, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(< c0, c1 > ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  imp(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c4, cv(hs0))))

} = {
  eqsstri(cdm(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0, cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))))
  dmopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  eqsstri(cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))), c0, cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, w0))))
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, w0)))
  19.42v(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  ssab2(s0, c0, wex(s1, w0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

thm dmopabss(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {

blocks.name: opabssxpd
blocks.content: An ordered-pair class abstraction is a subset of a Cartesian product. Formerly part of proof for ~ opabex2 . (Contributed by AV, 26-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabssxpd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c1))), diffss(s0, s1))
  syl5eqss(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))), w0)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w1)
  abssdv(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))
  exlimdvv(s0, s1, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1)))
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1)))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)
  adantrl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1, wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  opelxpd(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1, wa(w0, w1))
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

thm opabssxpd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { < s0, s1 > | w1 } ⊆(c0 × c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ s0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ s1 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → { < s0, s1 > | w1 } ⊆(c0 × c1)), d(s0, s1))
  syl5eqss({ < s0, s1 > | w1 }, (c0 × c1), { hs0 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))}, w0)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, w1)
  abssdv(hs0, (c0 × c1), w0, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))))
  exlimdvv(s0, s1, w0, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1), hs0 ∈(c0 × c1))
  ex(w0, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1), hs0 ∈(c0 × c1))
  eqeltrd(hs0, (c0 × c1), < s0, s1 >, (w0 ∧(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w1)
  adantrl(w0, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w1, < s0, s1 > ∈(c0 × c1))
  opelxpd(s0, s1, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ w1))
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c0 × c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (c0 × c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

  xchbinxr(wal(hs1, wn(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))

  eldm2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  albii(hs1, ¬ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 ↔ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ∅))
  nbn(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ∅)
  noel(< hs0, hs1 >)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: dmxp
blocks.content: The domain of a Cartesian product. Part of Theorem 3.13(x) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jul-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmxp(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c0)), c1))
} = {
  syl5eq(cdm(cxp(c1, c0)), c1, cdm(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  dmeqi(cxp(c1, c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c0)
  sylib(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cdm(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  ralrimivw(hs0, c1, wne(c0, emptycls), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  biimpi(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  dmopab3(hs0, hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wne(c0, emptycls))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmxp(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ ∅ → dom((c1 × c0))= c1)
} = {
  syl5eq(dom((c1 × c0)), c1, dom({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)}), c0 ≠ ∅)
  dmeqi((c1 × c0), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)})
  df-xp(hs0, hs1, c1, c0)
  sylib(c0 ≠ ∅, dom({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)})= c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, c1, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0))
  biimpi(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c0))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  dmopab3(hs0, hs1, c1, hs1 ∈ c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ≠ ∅)
}

blocks.name: elreldm
blocks.content: The first member of an ordered pair in a relation belongs to the domain of the relation. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jul-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm elreldm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0)), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0)))
} = {
  imp(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0)))
  syli(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  syl6ib(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wrel(c0), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cxp(universe, universe))), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df-rel(c0)
  ssel(c0, cxp(universe, universe), c1)
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c1)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0))))
  sylibrd(wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  syl6bi(wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  eleq1d(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0), cv(hs0), wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  syl6eq(cint(cint(c1)), cv(hs0), cint(cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  inteqd(cint(c1), cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  inteq(c1, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  op1stb(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cint(cint(c1)), cdm(c0))))
}

thm elreldm(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Rel(c0)∧ c1 ∈ c0)→ ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
} = {
  imp(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ c0, ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  syli(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ c0, ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >)))
  syl6ib(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >)), c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(Rel(c0), (c1 ∈ c0 → c1 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-rel(c0)
  ssel(c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), c1)
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c1)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >, (c1 ∈ c0 → ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
  sylibrd(c1 = < hs0, hs1 >, c1 ∈ c0, ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ dom(c0))
  syl6bi(c1 = < hs0, hs1 >, c1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)
  eleq1(c1, < hs0, hs1 >, c0)
  opeldm(hs0, hs1, c0)
  eleq1d(⋂ ⋂ c1, dom(c0), hs0, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  syl6eq(⋂ ⋂ c1, hs0, ⋂ ⋂ < hs0, hs1 >, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  inteqd(⋂ c1, ⋂ < hs0, hs1 >, c1 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  inteq(c1, < hs0, hs1 >)
  op1stb(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ∈ c0 → ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ∈ c0 → ⋂ ⋂ c1 ∈ dom(c0)))
}

thm rnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))), crn(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))
  rnopab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  rneqi(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  eqtri(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), cmpt(s1, c1, c2))
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  abbii(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm elrnmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

thm elrnmpt1s(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  rspceeqv(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2, c5)
  biimparc(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))

}

thm elrnmpt1s(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c2 ∈ ran(c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c5 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {

  eqid(c2)
  rspceeqv(s0, c0, c1, c2, c2, c5)
  biimparc(∃(s0 ∈ c1, c2 = c5), c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ ran(c4))
  elrnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c4, c1, c5)
}

  syl5bb(hs1 = c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈[hs0 / s0]c0 ∧ c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈[hs0 / s0]c0 ∧ hs1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)))
  bitri(∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs1 = c1), ∃(hs0,(hs0 ∈[hs0 / s0]c0 ∧ hs1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, hs1 = c1)

blocks.content: Membership in the range of a function. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrnmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

  syl5bb(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  eleq2i(c3, crn(c4), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c4, c0, c1)
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe)))
  ex(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1))), wcel(c3, universe), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1))))
  r19.29(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  elexd(c3, c2, wa(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1)))
  biimparc(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c3, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  eleq1(c3, c1, c2)
  elab3g(hs0, c3, universe, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c3, c1))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c3, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm elrnmptg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ∈ ran(c4)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1)))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {

  eleq2i(c3, ran(c4), { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)})
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c4, c0, c1)
  syl(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), (c3 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)} ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1)), (∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1)→ c3 ∈ 𝕌))

  r19.29(s0, c0, c1 ∈ c2, c3 = c1)
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 = c1), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  elexd(c3, c2, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 = c1))
  biimparc(c1 ∈ c2, c3 = c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  eleq1(c3, c1, c2)
  elab3g(hs0, c3, universe, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c3, hs0 = c1, c3 = c1)
  eqeq1(hs0, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, c3 = c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm riinint(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4d(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3)), cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(c0, cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  ineq2d(c0, ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, universe)))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, universe)))
  ralimdv(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, universe))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c3, c0), wcel(c3, universe))
  ssexg(c3, c0, c1)
  dfiin3g(s0, c2, c3, universe)
  syl5eq(cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(c0, cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), cin(cint(csn(c0)), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  intun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  ineq1d(cint(csn(c0)), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0)), wceq(cint(csn(c0)), c0))

}

thm dmrnssfld(class c0) {

} = {

  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)

  mpi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  prid1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sseld(cv(hs0), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  ssriv(hs1, crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cuni(c0))), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  elrn2(hs0, cv(hs1), c0)
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cuni(c0))))
  mpi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  prid2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  sseld(cv(hs1), cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  syl(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)))
  syl5eqelr(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0), cuni(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  uniop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  uniopel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  elssuni(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cuni(c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cuni(c0))))
}

thm dmrnssfld(class c0) {
  ⊢ (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))⊆ ⋃ ⋃ c0
} = {

blocks.name: dmcoss
blocks.content: Domain of a composition. Theorem 21 of [Suppes] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmcoss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(c1))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(ccom(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c1)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(c0, c1))), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  exlimi(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(c0, c1)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  nfe1(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccom(c0, c1)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))))
  exsimpl(hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))
  opelco(hs2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  cbvexvw(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs0), c1)
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1))
  eldm(hs1, cv(hs0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(ccom(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(ccom(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm dmcoss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ dom((c0 ∘ c1))⊆ dom(c1)
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, dom((c0 ∘ c1)), dom(c1))
  3imtr4i(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 ∘ c1)), hs0 ∈ dom(c1), ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 ∘ c1)), ∃(hs1, hs0[c1]hs1))
  exlimi(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 ∘ c1), ∃(hs1, hs0[c1]hs1))
  nfe1(hs1, hs0[c1]hs1)
  3imtr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 ∘ c1), ∃(hs1, hs0[c1]hs1), ∃(hs2,(hs0[c1]hs2 ∧ hs2[c0]hs1)), ∃(hs2, hs0[c1]hs2))
  exsimpl(hs2, hs0[c1]hs2, hs2[c0]hs1)
  opelco(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  cbvexvw(hs1, hs2, hs0[c1]hs1, hs0[c1]hs2)
  breq2(hs1, hs2, hs0, c1)
  eldm2(hs1, hs0, (c0 ∘ c1))
  eldm(hs1, hs0, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom((c0 ∘ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c1))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0[c1]hs2)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0[c1]hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 ∘ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  syl6ibr(wss(crn(c0), cdm(c1)), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))

  imbi12i(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c1)), wex(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))
  elrn(hs0, cv(hs1), c0)

thm rncoeq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wceq(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(c0)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wceq(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(c0)), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c1)), crn(ccnv(c0))), wceq(cdm(ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0))), cdm(ccnv(c0))))
  dmcoeq(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0))
  bitri(wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c1)), crn(ccnv(c0))), wceq(crn(c1), cdm(c0)))
  eqcom(cdm(c0), crn(c1))
  eqeq12i(crn(c1), cdm(c0), cdm(ccnv(c1)), crn(ccnv(c0)))
  df-rn(c1)
  dfdm4(c0)
  eqeq12i(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(c0), cdm(ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0))), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
  eqtri(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), cdm(ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0))), cdm(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1))))
  df-rn(ccom(c0, c1))
  dmeqi(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvco(c0, c1)
  df-rn(c0)
}

thm rncoeq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (dom(c0)= ran(c1)→ ran((c0 ∘ c1))= ran(c0))
} = {
  3imtr4i(dom(c0)= ran(c1), ran((c0 ∘ c1))= ran(c0), dom(`' c1)= ran(`' c0), dom((`' c1 ∘ `' c0))= dom(`' c0))
  dmcoeq(`' c1, `' c0)
  bitri(dom(c0)= ran(c1), dom(`' c1)= ran(`' c0), ran(c1)= dom(c0))
  eqcom(dom(c0), ran(c1))
  eqeq12i(ran(c1), dom(c0), dom(`' c1), ran(`' c0))
  df-rn(c1)
  dfdm4(c0)
  eqeq12i(ran((c0 ∘ c1)), ran(c0), dom((`' c1 ∘ `' c0)), dom(`' c0))
  eqtri(ran((c0 ∘ c1)), dom((`' c1 ∘ `' c0)), dom(`'(c0 ∘ c1)))
  df-rn((c0 ∘ c1))
  dmeqi(`'(c0 ∘ c1), (`' c1 ∘ `' c0))
  cnvco(c0, c1)
  df-rn(c0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm csbres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cres(c1, c2)), cres(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
} = {
  eqtri(csb(s0, c0, cres(c1, c2)), cres(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))))
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, cres(c1, c2), cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)))
  df-res(c1, c2)
  3eqtr4i(csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))), cres(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe))), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe)))
  ineq2i(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe)), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe))
  pm2.61i(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe)), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe)), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe)), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, universe)), wcel(c0, universe))
  csbxp(s0, c0, c2, universe)
  xpeq2d(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, universe), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, universe)
  3eqtr4rd(csb(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe)), cxp(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe), cxp(emptycls, universe), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  a1i(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cxp(emptycls, universe), emptycls))
  0xp(universe)
  xpeq1d(csb(s0, c0, c2), universe, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  csbprc(s0, c0, cxp(c2, universe))
  csbin(s0, c0, c1, cxp(c2, universe))
  df-res(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0](c1 |` c2)=([c0 / s0]c1 |`[c0 / s0]c2)
} = {
  eqtri([c0 / s0](c1 |` c2), ([c0 / s0]c1 |`[c0 / s0]c2), [c0 / s0](c1 ⋂(c2 × 𝕌)))
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, (c1 |` c2), (c1 ⋂(c2 × 𝕌)))
  df-res(c1, c2)
  3eqtr4i([c0 / s0](c1 ⋂(c2 × 𝕌)), ([c0 / s0]c1 |`[c0 / s0]c2), ([c0 / s0]c1 ⋂[c0 / s0](c2 × 𝕌)), ([c0 / s0]c1 ⋂([c0 / s0]c2 × 𝕌)))
  ineq2i([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0](c2 × 𝕌), ([c0 / s0]c2 × 𝕌))
  pm2.61i([c0 / s0](c2 × 𝕌)=([c0 / s0]c2 × 𝕌), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq([c0 / s0](c2 × 𝕌), ([c0 / s0]c2 × 𝕌), ([c0 / s0]c2 ×[c0 / s0]𝕌), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbxp(s0, c0, c2, universe)
  xpeq2d([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]𝕌, universe, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, universe)
  3eqtr4rd([c0 / s0](c2 × 𝕌), ([c0 / s0]c2 × 𝕌), (∅ × 𝕌), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, (∅ × 𝕌)= ∅)
  0xp(universe)
  xpeq1d([c0 / s0]c2, universe, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  csbprc(s0, c0, (c2 × 𝕌))
  csbin(s0, c0, c1, (c2 × 𝕌))
  df-res([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm dfres3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cres(c0, c1), cin(c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0))))
} = {
  eqtri(cres(c0, c1), cin(c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0))), cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))
  df-res(c0, c1)
  ineqri(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, universe), cin(c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, universe))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, crn(c0)))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, crn(c0))))
  3bitr4g(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, crn(c0))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe))))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0)))))))
  2exbidv(hs1, hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0)))))
  pm5.32d(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0))))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0)))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0)
  syl5bbr(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  biantru(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), universe))
  biantrud(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c0)))
  opelrn(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), c1, universe)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), c1, crn(c0))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, universe))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cxp(c1, crn(c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(crn(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfres3(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 |` c1)=(c0 ⋂(c1 × ran(c0)))
} = {
  eqtri((c0 |` c1), (c0 ⋂(c1 × ran(c0))), (c0 ⋂(c1 × 𝕌)))
  df-res(c0, c1)
  ineqri(hs0, c0, (c1 × 𝕌), (c0 ⋂(c1 × ran(c0))))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 × 𝕌)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂(c1 × ran(c0))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 × ran(c0))))
  pm5.32i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 × 𝕌), hs0 ∈(c1 × ran(c0)))
  3bitr4g(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 × 𝕌), hs0 ∈(c1 × ran(c0)), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌)))), ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0))))))
  2exbidv(hs1, hs2, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌)), (hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0))))
  pm5.32d(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌), (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0)))
  com12(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, ((hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌)↔(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0))))
  syl6bi(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >, hs0 ∈ c0, ((hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌)↔(hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0))), < hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0)
  eleq1(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, c0)
  syl5bbr(< hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0, (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ 𝕌), (hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ ran(c0)), hs1 ∈ c1)
  biantru(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ 𝕌)
  biantrud(< hs1, hs2 > ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ ran(c0))
  opelrn(hs1, hs2, c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs2)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, hs0, c1, universe)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, hs0, c1, ran(c0))
  elin(hs0, c0, (c1 × ran(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂(c1 × ran(c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(ran(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(ran(c0))
}

thm resieq(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c2, c1, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cv(hs0))), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, cres(cid, c1))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), cres(cid, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), cid))
  opres(c0, c1, cv(hs0), cid)
  df-br(c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0))
  bitr3i(wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(c0, cv(hs0)), cid), wbr(c0, cid, cv(hs0)))
  ideq(c0, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  df-br(c0, cid, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cres(cid, c1), c2), wceq(c0, c2))))
}

thm resiun2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cres(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), ciun(s0, c1, cres(c0, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cres(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2)), ciun(s0, c1, cres(c0, c2)), cin(c0, cxp(ciun(s0, c1, c2), universe)))
  df-res(c0, ciun(s0, c1, c2))
  eqtr4i(ciun(s0, c1, cres(c0, c2)), cin(c0, cxp(ciun(s0, c1, c2), universe)), ciun(s0, c1, cin(c0, cxp(c2, universe))))
  iuneq2i(s0, c1, cres(c0, c2), cin(c0, cxp(c2, universe)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cres(c0, c2), cin(c0, cxp(c2, universe))))
  df-res(c0, c2)
  eqtr4i(cin(c0, cxp(ciun(s0, c1, c2), universe)), ciun(s0, c1, cin(c0, cxp(c2, universe))), cin(c0, ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, universe))))
  ineq2i(c0, cxp(ciun(s0, c1, c2), universe), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(c2, universe)))
  xpiundir(s0, c1, c2, universe)
  iunin2(s0, c1, c0, cxp(c2, universe))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dmres
blocks.content: The domain of a restriction. Exercise 14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cin(c1, cdm(c0)))
} = {
  eqcomi(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), cin(c1, cdm(c0)))
  ineqri(hs0, c1, cdm(c0), cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cres(c0, c1))), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1))))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), cres(c0, c1))
  3bitr4i(wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))))
  19.42v(hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  exbii(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmres(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ dom((c0 |` c1))=(c1 ⋂ dom(c0))
} = {
  eqcomi(dom((c0 |` c1)), (c1 ⋂ dom(c0)))
  ineqri(hs0, c1, dom(c0), dom((c0 |` c1)))
  bitr2i((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` c1)), ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 |` c1)))
  eldm2(hs1, hs0, (c0 |` c1))
  3bitr4i(∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 |` c1)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)))
  19.42v(hs1, hs0 ∈ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)
  exbii(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 |` c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0))
  opelresi(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(hs1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0))
  eldm2(hs1, hs0, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(dom((c0 |` c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 |` c1))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm resima2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cima(cres(c2, c1), c0), cima(c2, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cima(cres(c2, c1), c0), cima(c2, c0), crn(cres(c2, cin(c1, c0))), crn(cres(c2, c0)), wss(c0, c1))
  rneqd(cres(c2, cin(c1, c0)), cres(c2, c0), wss(c0, c1))
  sylbi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cres(c2, cin(c1, c0)), cres(c2, c0)), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  reseq2(cin(c1, c0), c0, c2)
  eqtri(cima(cres(c2, c1), c0), crn(cres(c2, cin(c1, c0))), crn(cres(cres(c2, c1), c0)))
  df-ima(cres(c2, c1), c0)
  rneqi(cres(cres(c2, c1), c0), cres(c2, cin(c1, c0)))
  resres(c2, c1, c0)
  df-ima(c2, c0)
}

thm elinxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c3, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))))
  mpd(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrel(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  relinxp(c1, c2, c3)
  elrel(s0, s1, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), c0)
  2eximdv(s0, s1, wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  syl6ib(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  ancld(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  syl6com(wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  biimpd(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  biimpi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  an12(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  r2ex(s0, s1, c2, c3, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  rexlimivv(s0, s1, c2, c3, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  impd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  syl9(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  simplbi2(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  opelinxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c1, c2, c3)
  biimprd(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c1, cxp(c2, c3))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  diff.cin.s(s1, c1, cxp(c2, c3))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: elres
blocks.content: Membership in a restriction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 9-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm elres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wcel(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe))), wrex(s0, c2, wrex(s1, universe, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cres(c1, c2), cin(c1, cxp(c2, universe)))
  df-res(c1, c2)
  elinxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, universe)
  rexbii(s0, c2, wrex(s1, universe, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  rexv(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1 |` c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ∈(c1 |` c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))), c0 ∈(c1 ⋂(c2 × 𝕌)), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ 𝕌,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))))
  eleq2i(c0, (c1 |` c2), (c1 ⋂(c2 × 𝕌)))
  df-res(c1, c2)
  elinxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, universe)
  rexbii(s0, c2, ∃(s1 ∈ 𝕌,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)), ∃(s1,(c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1)))
  rexv(s1, (c0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ < s0, s1 > ∈ c1))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

  ancld(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  syl6com(wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)))

  ancomd(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  biimpi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  an12(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))
  3bitri(wrex(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))), wex(s1, wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))), wex(s1, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))))
  rexcom4(s0, s1, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  exbii(s1, wrex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  df-rex(s0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  excom(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  rexlimiv(s0, c2, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1))), wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
  exlimdv(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)), wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
  impd(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
  syl9(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)))
  simplbi2com(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)))
  opelresOLD2(cv(s0), cv(s1), c1, c2)
  vex(s1)
  biimprd(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cres(c1, c2)))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cres(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cres(c1, c2))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cres(c1, c2))
  diff.cres.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: elsnres
blocks.content: Membership in restriction to a singleton. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm elsnres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(c1, csn(c2))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cres(c1, csn(c2))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wex(s0, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))), wex(s0, wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  elres(hs0, s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  rexcom4(hs0, s0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))
  exbii(s0, wrex(hs0, csn(c2), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
  rexsn(hs0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1), wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1))
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cop(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cop(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c0, cop(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cop(c2, cv(s0)), c1)))
}

blocks.name: relssres
blocks.content: Simplification law for restriction. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm relssres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wceq(cres(c0, c1), c0), wa(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(c0, cres(c0, c1))))
  jctil(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)), wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(c0, cres(c0, c1)))
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, c0, cres(c0, c1), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
  simpl(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1))
  adantl(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1))))
  syl6ibr(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  ancrd(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl5(wss(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssel(cdm(c0), c1, cv(hs0))
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  resss(c0, c1)
  eqss(cres(c0, c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cdm(c0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relssres(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1)→(c0 |` c1)= c0)
} = {
  sylibr((Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1), (c0 |` c1)= c0, ((c0 |` c1)⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ⊆(c0 |` c1)))
  jctil((Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1), (c0 |` c1)⊆ c0, c0 ⊆(c0 |` c1))
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, c0, (c0 |` c1), (Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1))
  simpl(Rel(c0), dom(c0)⊆ c1)
  adantl(Rel(c0), dom(c0)⊆ c1, (< hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0 → < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 |` c1)))
  syl6ibr(dom(c0)⊆ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 |` c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0))
  ancrd(dom(c0)⊆ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl5(dom(c0)⊆ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ dom(c0))
  opeldm(hs0, hs1, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssel(dom(c0), c1, hs0)
  opelresi(hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  vex(hs1)
  resss(c0, c1)
  eqss((c0 |` c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 |` c1))
  diff.hs0.w((Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1))
  diff.hs1.w((Rel(c0)∧ dom(c0)⊆ c1))
}

blocks.name: dmressnsn
blocks.content: The domain of a restriction to a singleton is a singleton. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: eldmressnsn
blocks.content: The element of the domain of a restriction to a singleton is the element of the singleton. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)

blocks.name: eldmeldmressn
blocks.content: An element of the domain (of a relation) is an element of the domain of the restriction (of the relation) to the singleton containing this element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)

blocks.name: resdm
blocks.content: A relation restricted to its domain equals itself. (Contributed by NM, 12-Dec-2006.)

blocks.name: resexg
blocks.content: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: resex
blocks.content: The restriction of a set is a set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: resindm
blocks.content: When restricting a relation, intersecting with the domain of the relation has no effect. (Contributed by FL, 6-Oct-2008.)

blocks.name: resdmdfsn
blocks.content: Restricting a relation to its domain without a set is the same as restricting the relation to the universe without this set. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: resopab
blocks.content: Restriction of a class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2002.)
blocks.origin:
thm resopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cres(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(cres(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)))
  df-res(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0)
  eqtri(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  eqtri(cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe)), cin(copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), cin(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ineq2i(copab(s0, s1, w0), cxp(c0, universe), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqtr4i(cxp(c0, universe), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe))))
  df-xp(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  opabbii(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  biantru(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  incom(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  inopab(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: iss
blocks.content: A subclass of the identity function is the identity function restricted to its domain. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm iss(class c0) {

} = {
