  syl6bbr(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid)))
  impbid(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid)))
  jcad(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))
  a1i(wss(c0, cid), wi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  opeldm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  impcomd(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  syl5bi(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl5ibcom(wss(c0, cid), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl5bi(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  exlimdv(hs1, wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  sylcom(wss(c0, cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid))
  ssel(c0, cid, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  syl5bi(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cid), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  biimprcd(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  opeq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cid, cdm(c0))
  vex(hs1)
  sylancl(wss(c0, cid), wb(wceq(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cdm(c0))))))), wrel(c0), wrel(cres(cid, cdm(c0))))
  mpi(wss(c0, cid), wrel(c0), wrel(cid))
  reli()
  relss(c0, cid)
  relres(cid, cdm(c0))
  eqrel(hs0, hs1, c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0)))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0))), wss(c0, cid), wss(cres(cid, cdm(c0)), cid))
  resss(cid, cdm(c0))
  sseq1(c0, cres(cid, cdm(c0)), cid)

  diff.hs1.w(wss(c0, cid))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, cdm(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(cid, cdm(c0)))
}

blocks.content: Restriction of a class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm resopab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cres(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5eq(cres(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wss(c0, c1))
  resopab(s0, s1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  syl6rbb(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), w0))

thm elrid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cres(cid, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cres(cid, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cin(cid, cxp(c1, universe))), wrex(s0, cin(c1, universe), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cres(cid, c1), cin(cid, cxp(c1, universe)))
  df-res(cid, c1)
  elidinxp(s0, c0, c1, universe)
  rexeqi(s0, cin(c1, universe), c1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  inv1(c1)

}

thm elrid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

blocks.content: The restricted identity expressed with the class builder. (Contributed by FL, 25-Apr-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabresid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), cres(cid, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr3i(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), cres(cid, c0), cres(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c0))
  resopab(s0, s1, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  reseq1i(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), c0, cid)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cid, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  equcom(s1, s0)
  df-id(s0, s1)
}

thm opabresid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 = s0)} =(= |` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtr3i({ < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 = s0)}, (= |` c0), ({ < s0, s1 > | s1 = s0 } |` c0))
  resopab(s0, s1, c0, s1 = s0)
  reseq1i({ < s0, s1 > | s1 = s0 }, c0, cid)
  eqtr4i({ < s0, s1 > | s1 = s0 }, cid, { < s0, s1 > | s0 = s1 })
  opabbii(s0, s1, s1 = s0, s0 = s1)
  equcom(s1, s0)
  df-id(s0, s1)
}

  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

} = {

blocks.name: dfima2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of image. Compare definition (d) of [Enderton] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfima2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cima(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), crn(cres(c0, c1)), cab(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)))))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  dfrn2(s0, s1, cres(c0, c1))
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  bitr4i(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  exbii(s1, wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  elv(s0, wb(wbr(cv(s1), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  brres(cv(s0), universe, cv(s1), c0, c1)
  df-rex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfima2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 " c1)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((c0 " c1), { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0)}, ran((c0 |` c1)), { s0 | ∃(s1, s1[(c0 |` c1)]s0)})
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  dfrn2(s0, s1, (c0 |` c1))
  abbii(s0, ∃(s1, s1[(c0 |` c1)]s0), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0))
  bitr4i(∃(s1, s1[(c0 |` c1)]s0), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s1[c0]s0)))
  exbii(s1, s1[(c0 |` c1)]s0, (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s1[c0]s0))
  elv(s0, (s1[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ↔(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s1[c0]s0)))
  brres(s0, universe, s1, c0, c1)
  df-rex(s1, c1, s1[c0]s0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

thm dfima3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  bitri(wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))), wrex(s1, c1, wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))
  rexbii(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))

blocks.name: elimag
blocks.content: Membership in an image. Theorem 34 of [Suppes] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimag(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cima(c2, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cima(c2, c3), wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0)), wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0))))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), c2)
  dfima2(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elimag(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈(c2 " c3)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0[c2]c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, (c2 " c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0[c2]c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0[c2]hs0))
  rexbidv(s0, c3, hs0 = c0, s0[c2]hs0, s0[c2]c0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, s0, c2)
  dfima2(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c3, s0[c2]c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  rexsng(hs0, c0, universe, hs0[c2]s0, c0[c2]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c0, c2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[c2]s0)
}

  nexdv(s0, wa(wrel(c0), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))

blocks.pretty:
thm relimasn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→(c0 " { c1 })= { s0 | c1[c0]s0 })

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {

  adantl(Rel(c0), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 " { c1 })= ∅)
  syl6eq((c0 " { c1 }), emptycls, (c0 " ∅), ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylbi(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 " { c1 })=(c0 " ∅), { c1 } = ∅)

  imaeq2({ c1 }, emptycls, c0)

  abn0(s0, c1[c0]s0)

  diff.wn.s(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, cima(c4, csn(c0)))

blocks.name: args
blocks.content: Two ways to express the class of unique-valued arguments of ` F ` , which is the same as the domain of ` F ` whenever ` F ` is a function. The left-hand side of the equality is from Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65. Quine uses the notation "arg ` F ` " for this class (for which we have no separate notation). Observe the resemblance to the alternate definition ~ dffv4 of function value, which is based on the idea in Quine's definition. (Contributed by NM, 8-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm args(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))))), cab(s0, weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  abbii(s0, wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wex(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)))), weu(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wceq(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(cv(s1)))))
  exbii(s1, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(cv(s1))))
  eqeq1i(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(s1)), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  elv(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  imasng(s1, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  euabsn(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: eliniseg
blocks.content: Membership in an initial segment. The idiom ` ( ``' A " { B } ) ` , meaning ` { x | x A B } ` , is used to specify an initial segment in (for example) Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: epini
blocks.content: Any set is equal to its preimage under the converse epsilon relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: iniseg
blocks.content: An idiom that signifies an initial segment of an ordering, used, for example, in Definition 6.21 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm iniseg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  abbi2dv(s0, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cv(s0), c2, c0))
  eliniseg(c0, universe, cv(s0), c2)

  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c2), csn(c0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  snprc(c0)
  ima0(ccnv(c1))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, universe, wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wne(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wne(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, crn(c1))
  neeq1d(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), emptycls, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  3bitr4ri(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c1)), wne(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), emptycls), wne(cab(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0))))
  abn0(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)))
  neeq1i(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), emptycls, cab(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0))))
  elv(hs0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), cab(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0)))))
  iniseg(hs1, cv(hs0), universe, c1)
  elrn(hs1, cv(hs0), c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wne(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c0)), emptycls))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm inisegn0(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ran(c1)↔(`' c1 " { c0 })≠ ∅)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ∈ ran(c1), (`' c1 " { c0 })≠ ∅, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, ran(c1))
  necon1ai((`' c1 " { c0 }), emptycls, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eq((`' c1 " { c0 }), emptycls, (`' c1 " ∅), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  imaeq2d(`' c1, { c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  ima0(`' c1)
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, universe, c0 ∈ ran(c1), (`' c1 " { c0 })≠ ∅, hs0 ∈ ran(c1), (`' c1 " { hs0 })≠ ∅)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, ran(c1))
  neeq1d((`' c1 " { hs0 }), emptycls, (`' c1 " { c0 }), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq2d(`' c1, { hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  3bitr4ri(hs0 ∈ ran(c1), (`' c1 " { hs0 })≠ ∅, { hs1 | hs1[c1]hs0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1, hs1[c1]hs0))
  abn0(hs1, hs1[c1]hs0)
  neeq1i((`' c1 " { hs0 }), emptycls, { hs1 | hs1[c1]hs0 })
  elv(hs0, (`' c1 " { hs0 })= { hs1 | hs1[c1]hs0 })
  iniseg(hs1, hs0, universe, c1)
  elrn(hs1, hs0, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ran(c1))
  diff.hs0.w((`' c1 " { c0 })≠ ∅)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: dffr3

thm dffr3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitr4i(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls)))))
  dffr2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls))), wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls))))
  imbi2i(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls)))
  rexbii(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls), wceq(crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), emptycls, crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))))
  eqtr4i(cin(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), crab(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))), cin(cv(s0), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  ineq2i(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))))
  elv(s1, wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s1))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  iniseg(hs0, cv(s1), universe, c0)
  dfrab3(hs0, cv(s0), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}

thm dfse2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wse(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))), universe)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wse(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))), universe)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), universe)))
  df-se(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c1, wcel(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), universe), wcel(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))), universe))
  eleq1i(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), universe, cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  eqtr4i(crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))), cin(c1, cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  dfrab3(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))
  ineq2i(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  elv(s0, wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  iniseg(hs0, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))

thm dfse2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[Se]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c1 ⋂(`' c0 " { s0 }))∈ 𝕌))

} = {

  df-se(s0, hs0, c0, c1)

  eleq1i({ hs0 ∈ c1 | hs0[c0]s0 }, universe, (c1 ⋂(`' c0 " { s0 })))
  eqtr4i({ hs0 ∈ c1 | hs0[c0]s0 }, (c1 ⋂(`' c0 " { s0 })), (c1 ⋂ { hs0 | hs0[c0]s0 }))

blocks.name: cotrg
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that the composition of two relations is included in a third relation. See its special instance ~ cotr for the main application. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.) Generalized from its special instance ~ cotr . (Revised by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cotrg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))))), wrel(ccom(c0, c1)))
  relopabi(s0, s2, ccom(c0, c1), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))
  df-co(s0, s2, s1, c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s2, ccom(c0, c1), c2)
  albii(s0, wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  bitri(wal(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))), wal(s2, wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  albii(s2, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))
  bitr4i(wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))), wi(wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  opelco(s1, cv(s0), cv(s2), c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s2)
  bicomi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  df-br(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))
  19.23v(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))
  alcom(s2, s1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: cotr
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is transitive. Definition of transitivity in [Schechter] p. 51. Special instance of ~ cotrg . (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.)

blocks.name: idrefALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ idref not relying on definitions related to functions. Two ways to state that a relation is reflexive on a class. (Contributed by FL, 15-Jan-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.) (Revised by NM, 30-Mar-2016.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 28-Aug-2022.) The "proof modification is discouraged" tag is here only because this is an *ALT result. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm idrefALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wss(cres(cid, c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfss2(hs0, cres(cid, c0), c1)
  3bitr2i(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))))
  3bitr2i(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), wi(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
  elrid(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  r19.23v(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  pm5.74i(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c1)
  df-br(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
  ceqsalv(hs0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s0))
  biidd(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s0)))
}

blocks.name: cnvsym
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is symmetric. Similar to definition of symmetry in [Schechter] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 28-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvsym(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))))
  alcom(s1, s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))
  ax-mp(wb(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))))), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  ssrel(s1, s0, ccnv(c0), c0)
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0)))
  imbi12i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c0))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  df-br(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))
  df-br(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)

  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cin(c0, ccnv(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(c0))))

  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  df-br(cv(s0), ccnv(c0), cv(s1))
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cid, cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), cid, cv(s1))
  ideq(cv(s0), cv(s1))

blocks.name: intirr
blocks.content: Two ways of saying a relation is irreflexive. Definition of irreflexivity in [Schechter] p. 51. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm intirr(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wceq(cin(c0, cid), emptycls), wal(s0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3bitr2i(wceq(cin(c0, cid), emptycls), wal(s0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0))))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  3bitri(wceq(cin(c0, cid), emptycls), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0))))), wceq(cin(cid, c0), emptycls), wss(cid, cdif(universe, c0)))
  eqeq1i(cin(c0, cid), emptycls, cin(cid, c0))
  incom(c0, cid)
  disj2(cid, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cid, cdif(universe, c0)), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)))))), wrel(cid))
  reli()
  ssrel(s0, hs0, cid, cdif(universe, c0))
  2albii(s0, hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0))))
  imbi12i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)))
  3bitr2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cid), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0)))
  equcom(hs0, s0)
  ideq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  df-br(cv(s0), cid, cv(hs0))
  xchnxbir(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  bitr4i(wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cdif(universe, c0)), wa(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe), wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0))))
  biantrur(wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  eldif(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), universe, c0)
  df-br(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  albii(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  equsalvw(hs0, s0, wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s0), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, universe, c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
}

blocks.name: brcodir
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that two elements have an upper bound. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm brcodir(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(c4), c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, ccom(ccnv(c4), c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2))))
  brcog(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccnv(c4), c4)
  exbidv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0)))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c4), c2), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  brcnvg(cv(s0), universe, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c4)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

thm brcodir(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[(`' c4 ∘ c4)]c2 ↔ ∃(s0,(c0[c4]s0 ∧ c2[c4]s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c0[(`' c4 ∘ c4)]c2, ∃(s0,(c0[c4]s0 ∧ c2[c4]s0)), ∃(s0,(c0[c4]s0 ∧ s0[`' c4]c2)))
  brcog(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, `' c4, c4)
  exbidv(s0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[c4]s0 ∧ s0[`' c4]c2), (c0[c4]s0 ∧ c2[c4]s0))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ((c0[c4]s0 ∧ s0[`' c4]c2)↔(c0[c4]s0 ∧ c2[c4]s0)))
  anbi2d(c2 ∈ c3, c0[c4]s0, s0[`' c4]c2, c2[c4]s0)

blocks.name: codir

blocks.origin:
thm codir(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  3bitr4i(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1)
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1)))
  df-br(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1))
  el2v(s0, s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2), cv(s1)), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))
  brcodir(s2, cv(s0), universe, cv(s1), universe, c2)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2)))))), wrel(cxp(c0, c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c1), ccom(ccnv(c2), c2))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s0, ccnv(c2), c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.ccom.s(s1, ccnv(c2), c2)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)

blocks.name: qfto
blocks.content: A quantifier-free way of expressing the total order predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm qfto(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1)
  3bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1))))
  brun(cv(s0), c2, ccnv(c2), cv(s1))
  df-br(cv(s0), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)), cv(s1))
  orbi2i(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), ccnv(c2), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))
  brcnv(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  ax-mp(wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))))))), wrel(cxp(c0, c1)))
  relxp(c0, c1)
  ssrel(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2)))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wo(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c2, ccnv(c2))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s1, c2, ccnv(c2))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c2)
}

blocks.name: xpidtr
blocks.content: A square Cartesian product ` ( A X. A ) ` is a transitive relation. (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpidtr(class c0) {
  |- wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(c0, c0)), cxp(c0, c0))
} = {
  mpbir(wss(ccom(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(c0, c0)), cxp(c0, c0)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))))
  imp(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  brxp(cv(hs0), c0, c0, cv(hs1))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  simplbiim(wbr(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  brxp(cv(hs1), c0, c0, cv(hs2))
  simplbi2com(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c0), cv(hs2)))
  brxp(cv(hs0), c0, c0, cv(hs2))
  cotr(hs0, hs1, hs2, cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c0, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cxp(c0, c0))
}

thm xpidtr(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c0)∘(c0 × c0))⊆(c0 × c0)
} = {

  brxp(hs0, c0, c0, hs1)

blocks.name: trin2
blocks.content: The intersection of two transitive classes is transitive. (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm trin2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)), wss(ccom(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c1)), cin(c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1)), wss(ccom(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c1)), cin(c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))))))
  imp(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2)))))))
  sylbi(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wi(wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cv(hs2))))))), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))))

blocks.content: A partial order relation is irreflexive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Nov-2015.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

thm poirr2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wpo(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), emptycls))
} = {
  syl(wpo(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), emptycls), wss(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), emptycls))
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), emptycls, wpo(c0, c1))
  mp1i(wpo(c0, c1), wrel(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1))), wrel(cres(cid, c1)))
  relres(cid, c1)
  relin2(cres(cid, c1), c0)
  syl5bi(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(c0, cres(cid, c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))))
  bitr3i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cin(c0, cres(cid, c1))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs1)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)), cv(hs1))
  brin(cv(hs0), c0, cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))
  pm2.21d(wpo(c0, c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  sylib(wpo(c0, c1), wn(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))))
  con2d(wpo(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)))
  syl5bi(wpo(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(cid, c1), cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))))
  brresi(cv(hs0), cid, c1, cv(hs1))
  expimpd(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wpo(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0))))
  poirr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  notbid(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))

  diff.hs1.c(cin(c0, cres(cid, c1)))

thm poirr2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⪯ c1 →(c0 ⋂(= |` c1))= ∅)
} = {
  syl(c0 ⪯ c1, (c0 ⋂(= |` c1))= ∅, (c0 ⋂(= |` c1))⊆ ∅)
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, (c0 ⋂(= |` c1)), emptycls, c0 ⪯ c1)
  mp1i(c0 ⪯ c1, Rel((c0 ⋂(= |` c1))), Rel((= |` c1)))
  relres(cid, c1)
  relin2((= |` c1), c0)
  syl5bi(c0 ⪯ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 ⋂(= |` c1)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ∅, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1))
  bitr3i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈(c0 ⋂(= |` c1)), (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1), hs0[(c0 ⋂(= |` c1))]hs1)
  df-br(hs0, (c0 ⋂(= |` c1)), hs1)
  brin(hs0, c0, (= |` c1), hs1)
  pm2.21d(c0 ⪯ c1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ∅)
  sylib(c0 ⪯ c1, ¬(hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1), (hs0[c0]hs1 → ¬ hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1))
  con2d(c0 ⪯ c1, hs0[c0]hs1, hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1)
  syl5bi(c0 ⪯ c1, hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0[=]hs1))
  brresi(hs0, cid, c1, hs1)
  expimpd(c0 ⪯ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[=]hs1, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1)
  syl5ibcom((c0 ⪯ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0[=]hs1, ¬ hs0[c0]hs1, ¬ hs0[c0]hs0)
  poirr(c0, c1, hs0)
  notbid(hs0[=]hs1, hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs1)
  sylbi(hs0[=]hs1, (hs0[c0]hs0 ↔ hs0[c0]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  ideq(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  breq2(hs0, hs1, hs0, c0)
  imnan(hs0[c0]hs1, hs0[(= |` c1)]hs1)
  ss0((c0 ⋂(= |` c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂(= |` c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c((c0 ⋂(= |` c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⪯ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ⪯ c1)
}

blocks.name: trinxp
blocks.content: The relation induced by a transitive relation on a part of its field is transitive. (Taking the intersection of a relation with a square Cartesian product is a way to restrict it to a subset of its field.) (Contributed by FL, 31-Jul-2009.)

blocks.name: soirri
blocks.content: A strict order relation is irreflexive. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)

blocks.name: sotri
blocks.content: A strict order relation is a transitive relation. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
  -| wor(c1, c4)
  -| wss(c1, cxp(c4, c4))
} = {
  mpcom(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))))
  anim12i(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3), wcel(c0, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4)))
  simpld(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4)
  brel(c2, c1, c3, c4, c4)
  3expb(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wor(c1, c4))
  sotr(c1, c4, c0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sotri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3)
  ⊣ c1 ≺ c4
  ⊣ c1 ⊆(c4 × c4)
} = {
  mpcom((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, (c0 ∈ c4 ∧(c2 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c4)))
  anim12i(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3, c0 ∈ c4, (c2 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  simpld(c0[c1]c2, c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4)
  brel(c0, c1, c2, c4, c4)
  brel(c2, c1, c3, c4, c4)
  3expb(c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c4, ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3))
  mpan((c0 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c4), ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c2[c1]c3)→ c0[c1]c3), c1 ≺ c4)
  sotr(c1, c4, c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: son2lpi
blocks.content: A strict order relation has no 2-cycle loops. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)

blocks.name: sotri2
blocks.content: A transitivity relation. (Read ` A <_ B ` and ` B < C ` implies ` A < C ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotri2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c4)), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wor(c3, c1)
  -| wss(c3, cxp(c1, c1))
} = {
  3imp231(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  mpand(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wn(wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wcel(c2, c1))
  simpld(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  brel(c2, c3, c4, c1, c1)
  com3r(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  syl6bir(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wi(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))
  con2bid(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  mpan(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))), wor(c3, c1))
  sotric(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  jaoi(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wi(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c0, c3, c4)))
  biimpd(wceq(c2, c0), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  breq1(c2, c0, c3, c4)
  ex(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  sotri(c0, c3, c2, c4, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sotri2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c2[c3]c0 ∧ c2[c3]c4)→ c0[c3]c4)
  ⊣ c3 ≺ c1
  ⊣ c3 ⊆(c1 × c1)
} = {
  3imp231(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c2[c3]c0, c2[c3]c4, c0[c3]c4)
  mpand(c2[c3]c4, c0 ∈ c1, (¬ c2[c3]c0 → c0[c3]c4), c2 ∈ c1)
  simpld(c2[c3]c4, c2 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c1)
  brel(c2, c3, c4, c1, c1)
  com3r(c2[c3]c4, (c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), ¬ c2[c3]c0, c0[c3]c4)
  syl6bir((c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), ¬ c2[c3]c0, (c2[c3]c4 → c0[c3]c4), (c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c3]c2))
  con2bid((c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c3]c2), c2[c3]c0)
  mpan((c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (c2[c3]c0 ↔ ¬(c2 = c0 ∨ c0[c3]c2)), c3 ≺ c1)
  sotric(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  jaoi(c2 = c0, c0[c3]c2, (c2[c3]c4 → c0[c3]c4))
  biimpd(c2 = c0, c2[c3]c4, c0[c3]c4)
  breq1(c2, c0, c3, c4)
  ex(c0[c3]c2, c2[c3]c4, c0[c3]c4)
  sotri(c0, c3, c2, c4, c1)
}

blocks.name: sotri3
blocks.content: A transitivity relation. (Read ` A < B ` and ` B <_ C ` implies ` A < C ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sotri3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wn(wbr(c0, c3, c4))), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  -| wor(c3, c1)
  -| wss(c3, cxp(c1, c1))
} = {
  3imp21(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wn(wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  mpan2d(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wn(wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wcel(c4, c1))
  simprd(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  brel(c2, c3, c4, c1, c1)
  com3r(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  syl6bir(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, c3, c4)), wi(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c2, c3, c0)), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c0)))
  con2bid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c0)), wbr(c0, c3, c4))
  mpan(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, c3, c4), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c0)))), wor(c3, c1))
  sotric(c3, c1, c0, c4)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, c4), wbr(c4, c3, c0), wi(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c2, c3, c0)))
  biimprd(wceq(c0, c4), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  breq2(c0, c4, c2, c3)
  expcom(wbr(c4, c3, c0), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(c2, c3, c0))
  sotri(c2, c3, c4, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sotri3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2[c3]c4 ∧ ¬ c0[c3]c4)→ c2[c3]c0)
  ⊣ c3 ≺ c1
  ⊣ c3 ⊆(c1 × c1)
} = {
  3imp21(c0 ∈ c1, c2[c3]c4, ¬ c0[c3]c4, c2[c3]c0)
  mpan2d(c2[c3]c4, c0 ∈ c1, (¬ c0[c3]c4 → c2[c3]c0), c4 ∈ c1)
  simprd(c2[c3]c4, c4 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1)
  brel(c2, c3, c4, c1, c1)
  com3r(c2[c3]c4, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1), ¬ c0[c3]c4, c2[c3]c0)
  syl6bir((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1), ¬ c0[c3]c4, (c2[c3]c4 → c2[c3]c0), (c0 = c4 ∨ c4[c3]c0))
  con2bid((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1), (c0 = c4 ∨ c4[c3]c0), c0[c3]c4)
  mpan((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ c1), (c0[c3]c4 ↔ ¬(c0 = c4 ∨ c4[c3]c0)), c3 ≺ c1)
  sotric(c3, c1, c0, c4)
  jaoi(c0 = c4, c4[c3]c0, (c2[c3]c4 → c2[c3]c0))
  biimprd(c0 = c4, c2[c3]c4, c2[c3]c0)
  breq2(c0, c4, c2, c3)
  expcom(c4[c3]c0, c2[c3]c4, c2[c3]c0)
  sotri(c2, c3, c4, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: poleloe
blocks.content: Express "less than or equals" for general strict orders. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: poltletr
blocks.content: Transitive law for general strict orders. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm poltletr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wi(wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, cun(c0, cid), c4)), wbr(c2, c0, c4)))
} = {
  sylbid(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, cun(c0, cid), c4)), wbr(c2, c0, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  anbi2d(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, cun(c0, cid), c4), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4)))
  adantl(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wb(wbr(c3, cun(c0, cid), c4), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wb(wbr(c3, cun(c0, cid), c4), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  poleloe(c4, c1, c3, c0)
  com12(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4))), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  jaodan(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c4), wceq(c3, c4), wi(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c4)))
  com12(wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c4)), wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  potr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  a1d(wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c3, c4)), wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  biimpac(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  breq2(c3, c4, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: somin1
blocks.content: Property of a minimum in a strict order. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm somin1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), cun(c0, cid), c2))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), cun(c0, cid), c2), wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)))
  pm2.61dan(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  adantl(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)))
  olcd(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2))
  iftrue(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3))), wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2)))
  biimpar(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2)))
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  syl6bb(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wn(wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2))), wn(wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
  sotric(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  notbii(wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2)))
  bitri(wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c2, c3)))
  orcom(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  orbi2i(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(c3, c2))
  eqcom(c2, c3)
  adantl(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wb(wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2))))
  syl(wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wb(wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2)), wo(wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2))), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c3))
  iffalse(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  orbi12d(wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c3), wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, c2))
  breq1(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c3, c0, c2)
  eqeq1(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c3, c2)
  ad2antrl(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wb(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), cun(c0, cid), c2), wo(wbr(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0, c2), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c2))))
  poleloe(c2, c1, cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), c0)
}

blocks.name: somincom
blocks.content: Commutativity of minimum in a total order. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm somincom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(cif(c2, c3, wbr(c2, c0, c3)), cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
} = {
  ifeqda(c2, c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  eqcomd(c2, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3)))
  iffalsed(c3, c2, wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  mpbi(wi(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wn(wbr(c3, c0, c2))), wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))))
  so2nr(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  nan(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  imp(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wceq(c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
  syl6bir(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, c0, c3)), wceq(c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2))), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)))
  con2bid(wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wo(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  sotric(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  jaoi(wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, c0, c2), wceq(c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2))))
  syl6req(c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2)), cif(c3, c3, wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wceq(c2, c3))
  ifeq2(c2, c3, c3, wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  ifid(c3, wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  eqcomd(c3, cif(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2)), wbr(c3, c0, c2))
  iftrue(c3, c2, wbr(c3, c0, c2))
}

} = {
  impbid1(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wa(wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c2, c0, c4)))

  syl22anc(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)))), wbr(c2, c0, c3), wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), cun(c0, cid), c3))
  3jca(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  syl12anc(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)))), wbr(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), cun(c0, cid), c3), wor(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  somin1(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  imp(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), cun(c0, cid), c3)), wbr(c2, c0, c3))
  poltletr(c0, c1, c2, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c3)
  syl22anc(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)))), wbr(c2, c0, c4), wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), cun(c0, cid), c4))
  ad2antrr(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wpo(c0, c1))
  sopo(c0, c1)

  simplr1(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))))
  ifcld(c3, c4, c1, wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)))), wbr(c3, c0, c4))

  simpll(wor(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))))
  simplr2(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))))
  simplr3(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))))
  somin2(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  imp(wa(wpo(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wa(wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), cun(c0, cid), c4)), wbr(c2, c0, c4))
  poltletr(c0, c1, c2, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c4)
  ifboth(c3, c4, wbr(c2, c0, c3), wbr(c2, c0, c4), wbr(c2, c0, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4))), wbr(c3, c0, c4))
  breq2(c3, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c2, c0)
  breq2(c4, cif(c3, c4, wbr(c3, c0, c4)), c2, c0)

blocks.name: cnvopab
blocks.content: The converse of a class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)), copab(s1, s0, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)), copab(s1, s0, w0))
  relcnv(copab(s0, s1, w0))
  relopab(s1, s0, w0)
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), copab(s1, s0, w0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsb(hs1, s0, w0)))
  opelopabsbALT(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, w0)
  sbcom2(hs0, s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), copab(s0, s1, w0))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  diff.hs0.c(copab(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  diff.hs1.c(copab(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm cnvopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ `' { < s0, s1 > | w0 } = { < s1, s0 > | w0 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqrelriiv(hs0, hs1, `' { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, { < s1, s0 > | w0 })
  relcnv({ < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  relopab(s1, s0, w0)
  3bitr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ `' { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < s1, s0 > | w0 }, < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0)
  bitri(< hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, [hs1 / s0][hs0 / s1]w0, [hs0 / s1][hs1 / s0]w0)
  opelopabsbALT(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, w0)
  sbcom2(hs0, s1, hs1, s0, w0)
  opelcnv(hs0, hs1, { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelopabsbALT(hs0, hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(`' { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  diff.hs0.c({ < s1, s0 > | w0 })
  diff.hs1.c(`' { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  diff.hs1.c({ < s1, s0 > | w0 })
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptcnv
blocks.content: The converse of a mapping function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmpt(s1, c2, c3), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  opabbidv(s1, s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c3)))
  eqtri(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), ccnv(copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  cnveqi(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))))
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  cnvopab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: cnv0

blocks.origin:
thm cnv0() {
  |- wceq(ccnv(emptycls), emptycls)
} = {
  nel0(hs0, ccnv(emptycls))
  mtbir(wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(emptycls)), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))))
  nex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))))
  nex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  intnan(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  br0(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))
  abeq2i(hs0, ccnv(emptycls), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))))
  eqtri(ccnv(emptycls), cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))))), copab(hs1, hs2, wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs2, emptycls)
  df-opab(hs1, hs2, hs0, wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(emptycls))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cv(hs2), emptycls, cv(hs1)))
}

thm cnv0() {
  ⊢ `' ∅ = ∅
} = {
  nel0(hs0, `' ∅)

  eqtri(`' ∅, { hs0 | ∃(hs1, ∃(hs2,(hs0 = < hs1, hs2 > ∧ hs2[∅]hs1)))}, { < hs1, hs2 > | hs2[∅]hs1 })

blocks.name: cnvi

  |- wceq(ccnv(cid), cid)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(ccnv(cid), cid, copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  bitri(wbr(cv(hs0), cid, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  ideq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  equcom(hs0, hs1)
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, cid)
  df-id(hs1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cid)
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
}

blocks.name: cnvun
blocks.content: The converse of a union is the union of converses. Theorem 16 of [Suppes] p. 62. (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
} = {
  eqtr4i(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)), cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  eqtr4i(ccnv(cun(c0, c1)), cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, cun(c0, c1))
  eqtr4i(cun(copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  unopab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  opabbii(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cv(hs1)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  brun(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1))
  uneq12i(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), copab(hs1, hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, c0)
  df-cnv(hs1, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm cnvun(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ `'(c0 ⋃ c1)=(`' c0 ⋃ `' c1)

  eqtr4i(`'(c0 ⋃ c1), (`' c0 ⋃ `' c1), ({ < hs1, hs0 > | hs0[c0]hs1 } ⋃ { < hs1, hs0 > | hs0[c1]hs1 }))

blocks.name: cnvdif
blocks.content: Distributive law for converse over class difference. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvdif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(cdif(c0, c1)), cdif(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
} = {

  eqtri(cxp(cdif(c0, c0), c1), emptycls, cxp(emptycls, c1))

thm difxp2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ×(c1 \ c2))=((c0 × c1)\(c0 × c2))
} = {

  difxp(c0, c1, c0, c2)
  uneq1i(((c0 \ c0)× c1), (c0 ×(c1 \ c2)), emptycls)

  difid(c0)

  uncom(emptycls, (c0 ×(c1 \ c2)))
  un0((c0 ×(c1 \ c2)))

blocks.name: resdisj
blocks.content: A double restriction to disjoint classes is the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

blocks.name: rnxp
blocks.content: The range of a Cartesian product. Part of Theorem 3.13(x) of [Monk1] p. 37. (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2004.)

blocks.name: dmxpss
blocks.content: The domain of a Cartesian product is a subclass of the first factor. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2007.)

  syl(c1 ≠ ∅, dom((c0 × c1))⊆ c0, dom((c0 × c1))= c0)
  dmxp(c1, c0)
  eqimss(dom((c0 × c1)), c0)
}

blocks.name: rnxpss

blocks.name: ssxpb

  |- wi(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wb(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3))))
} = {
  impbid1(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)))

  eqsstr3d(c0, cdm(cxp(c2, c3)), cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))))
  adantr(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wceq(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), c0))
  sylbir(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), c0), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls), wceq(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), c0))
  dmxp(c1, c0)
  adantl(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wss(cdm(cxp(c0, c1)), cdm(cxp(c2, c3))))
  dmss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  dmxpss(c2, c3)
  syl6ss(c1, c3, crn(cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))))
  eqsstr3d(c1, crn(cxp(c2, c3)), crn(cxp(c0, c1)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))))
  adantr(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wceq(crn(cxp(c0, c1)), c1))
  sylbir(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(crn(cxp(c0, c1)), c1), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  xpnz(c0, c1)
  adantr(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls), wceq(crn(cxp(c0, c1)), c1))
  rnxp(c0, c1)
  adantl(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wss(crn(cxp(c0, c1)), crn(cxp(c2, c3))))
  rnss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  rnxpss(c2, c3)
  xpss12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: xp11
blocks.content: The Cartesian product of nonempty classes is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm xp11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))

  xpnz(c0, c1)

  syl5bbr(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls)))
  anidm(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls))
  anbi2d(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls))
  neeq1(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)
  syl6ib(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wa(wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))))
  anim12d(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)))
  eqimss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  ssxpb(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl5ibcom(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3)), wne(cxp(c2, c3), emptycls), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1)), wss(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c0, c1)))
  eqimss2(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, c3))
  ssxpb(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wa(wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c1))))
  an4(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c3), wss(c2, c0), wss(c3, c1))
  anbi12i(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c2, c0)), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c1)))
  eqss(c0, c2)
  eqss(c1, c3)
  xpeq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)

blocks.name: xpcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl6bbr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wceq(c0, c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  xp11(c0, c1, c0, c2)
  biantrur(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c0))
  eqid(c0)
  impbid1(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wne(c1, emptycls))), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylan2b(wne(c0, emptycls), wn(wne(c1, emptycls)), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  nne(c1, emptycls)
  syl6an(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  simpr(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  sylbid(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wb(wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  syl6bb(wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cxp(c0, c2)))
  eqeq1d(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c0, c2), emptycls, wceq(c1, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cxp(c0, c1), emptycls, cxp(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  xpeq2(c1, emptycls, c0)
  xp0(c0)
  eqcom(emptycls, cxp(c0, c2))
  adantr(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  syl5bi(wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  xpeq0(c0, c2)
  orel1(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  eqtr3(c1, emptycls, c2)
  xpeq2(c1, c2, c0)
}

  syl6bb(wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0)), wceq(cxp(c2, c0), emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cxp(c2, c0)))
  eqeq1d(cxp(c1, c0), cxp(c2, c0), emptycls, wceq(c1, emptycls))

blocks.name: ssrnres

thm ssrnres(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wceq(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0))
} = {
  bitr2i(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wceq(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0), wss(c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))))
  mpbiran(wceq(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0), wss(c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wss(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0))
  sstri(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0, crn(cxp(c2, c0)))
  rnssi(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)), cxp(c2, c0))
  inss2(c1, cxp(c2, c0))
  rnxpss(c2, c0)
  eqss(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), c0)
  impbii(wss(c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  mpan2(wss(c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wss(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  rnssi(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)), cres(c1, c2))
  inxpssres(c1, c2, c0)
  sstr(c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), crn(cres(c1, c2)))
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  syl6ibr(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2)))))
  ancld(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2))))
  syl6ib(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  ssel(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2)), cv(hs0))
  elrn2(hs1, cv(hs0), cres(c1, c2))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2)))), wex(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2)))))
  elrn2(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))
  exbii(hs1, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2))))
  bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  opelinxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c1, c2, c0)
  bianassc(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))
  opelresi(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  19.42v(hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cres(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, crn(cres(c1, c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(c1, cxp(c2, c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))

thm ssrnres(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2))↔ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))= c0)
} = {
  bitr2i(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)), ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))= c0, c0 ⊆ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))))
  mpbiran(ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))= c0, c0 ⊆ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))⊆ c0)
  sstri(ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), c0, ran((c2 × c0)))
  rnssi((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)), (c2 × c0))
  inss2(c1, (c2 × c0))
  rnxpss(c2, c0)
  eqss(ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), c0)
  impbii(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)))
  mpan2(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)), ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)))
  rnssi((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)), (c1 |` c2))
  inxpssres(c1, c2, c0)
  sstr(c0, ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), ran((c1 |` c2)))
  ssrdv(hs0, c0, ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)))
  syl6ibr(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2))))
  ancld(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)), hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2)))
  syl6ib(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)), hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2)), hs0 ∈ ran((c1 |` c2)))
  ssel(c0, ran((c1 |` c2)), hs0)
  elrn2(hs1, hs0, (c1 |` c2))
  3bitri(hs0 ∈ ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ∃(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2))), ∃(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))), ∃(hs1,(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2))))
  elrn2(hs1, hs0, (c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))
  exbii(hs1, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2)))
  bitr4i(< hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2)), ((hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c1))
  opelinxp(hs1, hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  bianassc(hs0 ∈ c0, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2), hs1 ∈ c2, < hs1, hs0 > ∈ c1)
  opelresi(hs1, hs0, c1, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  19.42v(hs1, hs0 ∈ c0, < hs1, hs0 > ∈(c1 |` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ ran((c1 |` c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((c1 |` c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 ⋂(c2 × c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: rninxp
blocks.content: Range of the intersection with a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rninxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wceq(crn(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr3i(wceq(crn(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wss(c2, crn(cres(c0, c1))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), crn(cres(c0, c1)))))
  dfss3(s0, c2, crn(cres(c0, c1)))
  ssrnres(c2, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), crn(cres(c0, c1))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  bitr3i(wcel(cv(s0), crn(cres(c0, c1))), wrex(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(c0, c1)))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), cima(c0, c1), crn(cres(c0, c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  elima(s1, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, cres(c0, c1))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rninxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (ran((c0 ⋂(c1 × c2)))= c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3bitr3i(ran((c0 ⋂(c1 × c2)))= c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0)), c2 ⊆ ran((c0 |` c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ ran((c0 |` c1))))
  dfss3(s0, c2, ran((c0 |` c1)))
  ssrnres(c2, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c2, s0 ∈ ran((c0 |` c1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0))
  bitr3i(s0 ∈ ran((c0 |` c1)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s1[c0]s0), s0 ∈(c0 " c1))
  eleq2i(s0, (c0 " c1), ran((c0 |` c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  elima(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (c0 |` c1))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm dminxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wceq(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), c1), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3bitri(wceq(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), c1), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wceq(crn(cin(ccnv(c0), cxp(c2, c1))), c1), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)))))
  eqeq1i(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), c1, crn(cin(ccnv(c0), cxp(c2, c1))))
  eqtri(cdm(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), crn(cin(ccnv(c0), cxp(c2, c1))), crn(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))))
  dfdm4(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  rneqi(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), cin(ccnv(c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
  eqtri(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))), cin(ccnv(c0), cxp(c2, c1)), cin(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cxp(c1, c2))))
  cnvin(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  ineq2i(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c2, c1))
  cnvxp(c1, c2)
  rninxp(s0, s1, ccnv(c0), c2, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}
