thm imainrect(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cima(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3), cin(cima(c0, cin(c3, c1)), c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cima(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3), cin(cima(c0, cin(c3, c1)), c2), crn(cres(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3)), crn(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe))))
  rneqi(cres(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe)))
  df-res(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3)
  df-ima(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), c3)
  eqtr4i(cin(cima(c0, cin(c3, c1)), c2), crn(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe))), cin(crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2))
  ineq1i(cima(c0, cin(c3, c1)), c2, crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))))
  eqtri(cima(c0, cin(c3, c1)), crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), crn(cres(c0, cin(c3, c1))))
  df-ima(c0, cin(c3, c1))
  rneqi(cres(c0, cin(c3, c1)), cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)))
  df-res(c0, cin(c3, c1))
  3eqtr4ri(crn(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe))), cin(crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2), cdm(cres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2)), cdm(ccnv(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe)))))
  dmeqi(cres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2), ccnv(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe))))
  3eqtr4ri(cres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2), ccnv(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe))), ccnv(cin(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2))), cin(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), ccnv(cxp(universe, c2))))
  cnvin(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2))
  cnveqi(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2)))
  3eqtr4i(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, c2)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(universe, c2))))
  ineq2i(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, c2), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(universe, c2)))
  eqtr2i(cxp(c1, c2), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(universe, c2)), cxp(cin(c1, universe), cin(universe, c2)))
  inxp(c1, universe, universe, c2)
  xpeq12i(cin(c1, universe), cin(universe, c2), c1, c2)
  inv1(c1)
  eqtri(cin(universe, c2), c2, cin(c2, universe))
  incom(universe, c2)
  inv1(c2)
  in32(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c3, universe))
  eqtri(cin(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(universe, c2))), cin(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, universe)), cxp(universe, c2)))
  ineq1i(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cxp(universe, c2), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, universe)))
  eqtr4i(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)), cin(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, universe)), cin(c0, cin(cxp(c3, universe), cxp(c1, universe))))
  ineq2i(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe), cin(cxp(c3, universe), cxp(c1, universe)))
  xpindir(c3, c1, universe)
  inass(c0, cxp(c3, universe), cxp(c1, universe))
  inass(cin(c0, cxp(c3, universe)), cxp(c1, universe), cxp(universe, c2))
  eqtr4i(cres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2), cin(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), ccnv(cxp(universe, c2))), cin(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), cxp(c2, universe)))
  df-res(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2)
  ineq2i(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), ccnv(cxp(universe, c2)), cxp(c2, universe))
  cnvxp(universe, c2)
  3eqtr4ri(cin(crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2), cdm(cres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2)), cin(c2, cdm(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))))), cin(cdm(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)))), c2))
  incom(c2, cdm(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)))))
  dmres(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2)
  ineq1i(crn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe))), c2, cdm(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)))))
  df-rn(cin(c0, cxp(cin(c3, c1), universe)))
  df-rn(cin(cin(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c3, universe)))
}

blocks.name: xpima
blocks.content: The image by a constant function (or other Cartesian product). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), cif(emptycls, c1, wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
} = {
  mpbir(wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), cif(emptycls, c1, wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))), wo(wa(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls)), wa(wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), c1))))
  ax-mp(wo(wa(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls)), wa(wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), c1))), wo(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))))
  exmid(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  orim12i(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wa(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls)), wa(wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), c1)))
  ancli(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls, crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  syl6eq(crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)), emptycls, crn(emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  rneqd(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1), emptycls, wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  syl6eq(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1), emptycls, cxp(emptycls, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  xpeq1(cin(c0, c2), emptycls, c1)
  0xp(c1)
  rn0()
  ancli(wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wceq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), c1))
  syl5eq(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), c1, crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)), wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  3eqtri(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)), crn(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, universe))), crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, universe))))
  eqtri(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), crn(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, universe))), crn(cres(cxp(c0, c1), c2)))
  df-ima(cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  rneqi(cres(cxp(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, universe)))
  df-res(cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  rneqi(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c2, universe)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, universe)))
  inxp(c0, c1, c2, universe)
  rneqi(cxp(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, universe)), cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1))
  xpeq2i(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, universe), c1)
  inv1(c1)
  sylbir(wn(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wceq(crn(cxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)), c1), wne(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
  df-ne(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)
  rnxp(cin(c0, c2), c1)
  eqif(cima(cxp(c0, c1), c2), emptycls, c1, wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls))
}

blocks.name: sossfld
blocks.content: The base set of a strict order is contained in the field of the relation, except possibly for one element (note that ` (/) Or { B } ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sossfld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wss(cdif(c1, csn(c2)), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cdif(c1, csn(c2)), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  syl5bi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eldifsn(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  expimpd(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  sylbird(wa(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wne(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))))
  anass1rs(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wne(cv(hs0), c2)))
  necon2abid(cv(hs0), c2, wa(wor(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))))
  sotrieq(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  adantll(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  syl6ibr(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0))))
  orim12d(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  ancoms(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  3expia(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c2, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  breldmg(cv(hs0), c1, c2, c1, c0)
  3expia(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)))
  brelrng(c2, c1, cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  elun(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, csn(c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sossfld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→(c1 \ { c2 })⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c1 \ { c2 }), (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  syl5bi((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c1 \ { c2 }), hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ≠ c2))
  eldifsn(hs0, c1, c2)
  expimpd((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ≠ c2, hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  sylbird(((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ≠ c2, hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), (hs0[c0]c2 ∨ c2[c0]hs0))
  anass1rs(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, ((hs0[c0]c2 ∨ c2[c0]hs0)↔ hs0 ≠ c2))
  necon2abid(hs0, c2, (c0 ≺ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)), (hs0[c0]c2 ∨ c2[c0]hs0))
  sotrieq(c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  adantll(c0 ≺ c1, c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, ((hs0[c0]c2 ∨ c2[c0]hs0)→ hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))))
  syl6ibr((c2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0[c0]c2 ∨ c2[c0]hs0), hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), (hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∨ hs0 ∈ ran(c0)))
  orim12d((c2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0[c0]c2, c2[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs0 ∈ ran(c0))
  ancoms(c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0[c0]c2 → hs0 ∈ dom(c0)))
  3expia(hs0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1, hs0[c0]c2, hs0 ∈ dom(c0))
  breldmg(hs0, c1, c2, c1, c0)
  3expia(c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, c2[c0]hs0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0))
  brelrng(c2, c1, hs0, c1, c0)
  elun(hs0, dom(c0), ran(c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ { c2 }))
  diff.hs0.c((dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1))
}

blocks.name: sofld
blocks.content: The base set of a nonempty strict order is the same as the field of the relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sofld(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wor(c0, c1), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wceq(c1, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
} = {

thm sofld(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ c1 =(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
} = {
  eqssd(c1, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)∧ c0 ≠ ∅))
  3impia(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), c0 ≠ ∅, c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  necon1ad(c0, emptycls, (c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  ex((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), ¬ c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), c0 = ∅)
  syl(((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ ¬ c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))), c0 = ∅, c0 ⊆ ∅)
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, c0, emptycls, ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ ¬ c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))))
  ad2antlr(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), ¬ c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), Rel(c0))
  pm2.21d(((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ ¬ c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ ∅)
  con3dimp((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0)
  syl5bir((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈ c0, c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), hs0[c0]hs1)
  df-br(hs0, c0, hs1)
  ex((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), hs0[c0]hs1, c1 ⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)))
  syl5ss(c1, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), ((c1 \ { hs0 })⋃ { hs0 }), ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  sseqtr4i(c1, ((c1 \ { hs0 })⋃ { hs0 }), (c1 ⋃ { hs0 }))
  ssun1(c1, { hs0 })
  undif1(c1, { hs0 })
  unssd((c1 \ { hs0 }), { hs0 }, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1), (c1 \ { hs0 })⊆(dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), c0 ≺ c1, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpll(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs1)
  sseldd(hs0, c1, dom(c0), ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  ad2antlr(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs1, dom(c0)⊆ c1)
  sossfld(c0, c1, hs0)
  snssd(hs0, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  sseldi(hs0, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0)), dom(c0), ((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))∧ hs0[c0]hs1))
  ssun1(dom(c0), ran(c0))
  sylancom((c0 ≺ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆(c1 × c1)), hs0[c0]hs1, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), Rel(c0))
  ad2antlr(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), hs0[c0]hs1, Rel(c0))
  mpi(c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), Rel(c0), Rel((c1 × c1)))
  relxp(c1, c1)
  relss(c0, (c1 × c1))
  releldm(c0, hs0, hs1)
  ss0(c0)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ≺ c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1), c0 ≠ ∅, (dom(c0)⋃ ran(c0))⊆ c1)
  unssd(dom(c0), ran(c0), c1, c0 ⊆(c1 × c1))

blocks.name: cnvcnv3
blocks.content: The set of all ordered pairs in a class is the same as the double converse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvcnv3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0))))
  df-cnv(s0, s1, ccnv(c0))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s1), ccnv(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  brcnv(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: dfrel2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of relation. Exercise 2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfrel2(class c0) {
  |- wb(wrel(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0))
} = {
  impbii(wrel(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0))
  mpan(wrel(c0), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  eqrelriv(hs0, hs1, ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0)
  bitri(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ccnv(c0)))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(c0))
  opelcnv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  mpbii(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  relcnv(ccnv(c0))
  releq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: dfrel4v
blocks.content: A relation can be expressed as the set of ordered pairs in it. An analogue of ~ dffn5 for relations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)

thm dfrel4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

blocks.name: cnvcnv
blocks.content: The double converse of a class strips out all elements that are not ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 26-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvcnv(class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
} = {
  eqtri(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), ccnv(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))))
  3eqtr4ri(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))), ccnv(cin(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cxp(universe, universe)))), cin(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe)))))
  cnvin(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cxp(universe, universe)))
  cnveqi(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), cin(ccnv(c0), ccnv(cxp(universe, universe))))
  cnvin(c0, cxp(universe, universe))
  mpbi(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cin(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe))))), wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe)))))
  sseqtr4i(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe))), cxp(universe, universe))
  mpbi(wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  relcnv(ccnv(c0))
  df-rel(ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  mpbi(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe))), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(cxp(universe, universe)))
  relxp(universe, universe)
  dfrel2(cxp(universe, universe))
  dfss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(cxp(universe, universe))))
  mpbi(wceq(ccnv(ccnv(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))), cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe))), wrel(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe))))
  relinxp(c0, universe, universe)
  dfrel2(cin(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
}

  eldm2(hs1, cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, c0)))

  3eqtri(cdm(ctp(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3), cop(c4, c5))), cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), cdm(cun(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(cop(c4, c5)))), cun(cdm(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3))), cdm(csn(cop(c4, c5)))))
  dmeqi(ctp(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3), cop(c4, c5)), cun(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(cop(c4, c5))))

thm cnvcnvsn(class c0, class c1) {

  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(csn(cop(c1, c0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c1, c0))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), csn(cop(c0, c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), csn(cop(c1, c0))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c1, c0)))
  3bitr4i(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c1, c0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  ancom(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  opth(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, c1)
  opth(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  elsn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c1))
  opex(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  elsn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cop(c1, c0))
  opex(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  opelcnv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), csn(cop(c0, c1)))
  opelcnv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, c0)))
  vex(hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(csn(cop(c1, c0))))

  3bitr4i(< hs0, hs1 > ∈ { < c0, c1 > }, < hs1, hs0 > ∈ { < c1, c0 > }, < hs0, hs1 > = < c0, c1 >, < hs1, hs0 > = < c1, c0 >)

thm dmsnsnsn(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cdm(csn(csn(csn(c0)))), csn(c0))
} = {

  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(cdm(csn(csn(csn(c0)))), csn(c0)), wceq(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq12d(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))), csn(cv(hs0)), cdm(csn(csn(csn(c0)))), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), csn(csn(csn(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), csn(csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5eq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), csn(csn(c0)), csn(csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opid(cv(hs0))
  sneqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  dmsnop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  3eqtr4a(cdm(csn(csn(csn(c0)))), csn(c0), cdm(csn(csn(emptycls))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(csn(csn(emptycls))), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  dmsn0el(csn(emptycls))
  dmeqd(csn(csn(csn(c0))), csn(csn(emptycls)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  sneqd(csn(csn(c0)), csn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  sneqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))

  uneq12d(crn(csn(cop(c0, c4))), crn(csn(cop(c2, c5))), csn(c4), csn(c5), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(crn(csn(cop(c0, c4))), csn(c4)))
  rnsnopg(c0, c1, c4)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(crn(csn(cop(c2, c5))), csn(c5)))

thm opswap(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), cop(c1, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), cop(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl6eq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), cop(c1, c0), cuni(csn(cop(c1, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), csn(cop(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  cnvsng(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  unisn(cop(c1, c0))
  opex(c1, c0)
  3eqtr4a(cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1)))), cop(c1, c0), cuni(emptycls), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  uni0()
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  syl6eq(ccnv(csn(cop(c0, c1))), emptycls, ccnv(csn(emptycls)), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  cnveqd(csn(cop(c0, c1)), csn(emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  sneqd(cop(c0, c1), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  opprc(c0, c1)
  cnvsn0()
  sylnbi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cop(c1, c0), emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  ancom(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  opprc(c1, c0)
}

  3eqtri(cin(c0, cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(cdm(c0), universe))), cin(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cxp(c1, universe)), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), universe))), cin(cxp(c1, universe), ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
  in12(c0, cxp(c1, universe), cxp(cdm(c0), universe))
  ineq2i(cxp(c1, universe), cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), universe)), ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  eqtr3i(cin(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), universe)), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), cres(c0, cdm(c0)))
  df-res(c0, cdm(c0))
  resdm2(c0)
  incom(cxp(c1, universe), ccnv(ccnv(c0)))
  eqtri(cres(c0, cdm(cres(c0, c1))), cin(c0, cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(cdm(c0), universe))), cin(c0, cxp(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe)))
  df-res(c0, cdm(cres(c0, c1)))
  ineq2i(c0, cxp(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(cdm(c0), universe)))
  eqtri(cxp(cdm(cres(c0, c1)), universe), cin(cxp(c1, universe), cxp(cdm(c0), universe)), cxp(cin(c1, cdm(c0)), universe))

  in12(c0, (c1 × 𝕌), (dom(c0)× 𝕌))

  df-res(c0, dom((c0 |` c1)))

thm dfco2a(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(ccom(c0, c1), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), ciun(s0, universe, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2))
  dfco2(s0, c0, c1)

  3bitr4g(wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, universe, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c2, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, universe, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  3bitr4g(wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2), wrex(s0, universe, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  exbidv(s0, wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))))
  pm4.71rd(wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl5(wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  exlimivv(hs1, hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  anim12ci(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs2), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0)))
  elv(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))))
  eliniseg(cv(s0), universe, cv(hs1), c1)
  brelrn(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))
  vex(hs1)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs2), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(hs2)), c0))
  elimasn(cv(hs2), c0, cv(s0))
  opeldm(cv(s0), cv(hs2), c0)
  vex(s0)
  vex(hs2)
  elxp(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  elin(cv(s0), cdm(c0), crn(c1))
  ssel(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2, cv(s0))
  rexv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  df-rex(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), universe, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c2, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, universe, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c2, cxp(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), c2)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cdm(c0), crn(c1))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs2.c(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm coundi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(ccom(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(ccom(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2)), cun(copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  eqtri(cun(copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wo(wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))))
  unopab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  opabbii(hs0, hs2, wo(wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  bitr2i(wo(wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wo(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  exbii(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wo(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))))
  bitri(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wo(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wa(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))
  anbi1i(wbr(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))))
  brun(cv(hs0), c1, c2, cv(hs1))
  andir(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))
  19.43(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))
  uneq12i(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))), copab(hs0, hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))))
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, cun(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs2.c(cun(c1, c2))

thm coundi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∘(c1 ⋃ c2))=((c0 ∘ c1)⋃(c0 ∘ c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri((c0 ∘(c1 ⋃ c2)), ((c0 ∘ c1)⋃(c0 ∘ c2)), ({ < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))} ⋃ { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))})
  eqtri(({ < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))} ⋃ { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > |(∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)))})
  unopab(hs0, hs2, ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)))
  opabbii(hs0, hs2, (∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))), ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)))
  bitr2i((∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))), ∃(hs1,(hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ∃(hs1,((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))))
  exbii(hs1, (hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), ((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)))
  bitri((hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), ((hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ((hs0[c1]hs1 ∨ hs0[c2]hs1)∧ hs1[c0]hs2))
  anbi1i(hs0[(c1 ⋃ c2)]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, (hs0[c1]hs1 ∨ hs0[c2]hs1))
  brun(hs0, c1, c2, hs1)
  andir(hs0[c1]hs1, hs0[c2]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2)
  19.43(hs1, (hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))
  uneq12i((c0 ∘ c1), (c0 ∘ c2), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c1]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))})
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2)
  df-co(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, (c1 ⋃ c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)

thm coundir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋃ c1)∘ c2)=((c0 ∘ c2)⋃(c1 ∘ c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(((c0 ⋃ c1)∘ c2), ((c0 ∘ c2)⋃(c1 ∘ c2)), ({ < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))} ⋃ { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))}), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2))})
  eqtri(({ < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))} ⋃ { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))}), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > |(∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)))})
  unopab(hs0, hs2, ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)))
  opabbii(hs0, hs2, (∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2)))
  bitr2i((∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))∨ ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))), ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2)), ∃(hs1,((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))))
  exbii(hs1, (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2), ((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)))
  bitri((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2), ((hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2)∨(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2)), (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧(hs1[c0]hs2 ∨ hs1[c1]hs2)))
  anbi2i(hs0[c2]hs1, hs1[(c0 ⋃ c1)]hs2, (hs1[c0]hs2 ∨ hs1[c1]hs2))

  19.43(hs1, (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2), (hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))
  uneq12i((c0 ∘ c2), (c1 ∘ c2), { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs2))}, { < hs0, hs2 > | ∃(hs1,(hs0[c2]hs1 ∧ hs1[c1]hs2))})

  |- wi(wss(crn(c0), c1), wceq(ccom(cres(c2, c1), c0), ccom(c2, c0)))

  opabbidv(hs0, hs2, wss(crn(c0), c1), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c2, c1), cv(hs2)))), wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))
  exbidv(hs1, wss(crn(c0), c1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c2, c1), cv(hs2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))
  pm5.32d(wss(crn(c0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c2, c1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))
  syl56(wss(crn(c0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c2, c1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  brelrn(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  ssel(crn(c0), c1, cv(hs1))
  baib(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cres(c2, c1), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))
  brresi(cv(hs1), c2, c1, cv(hs2))

  exbii(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1)))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1, c2), cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs1))))

  exbii(hs2, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs2), cres(c0, crn(c1)), cv(hs0)))
  3bitr4ri(wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs2), cres(c0, crn(c1)), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), crn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs2), c0, cv(hs0))))

blocks.name: coeq0
blocks.content: A composition of two relations is empty iff there is no overlap between the range of the second and the domain of the first. Useful in combination with ~ coundi and ~ coundir to prune meaningless terms in the result. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Oct-2014.)

thm ressn(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  syl5bbr(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  elimasn(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cima(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  imaeq2d(c0, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), c1, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c1)
  opelresi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, csn(c1))
  vex(hs1)
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1))))

  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(ciin(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)))

  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciin(s0, c0, ccnv(c1))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c1)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), universe))

blocks.name: reuop
blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff there are uniquely two sets fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: opreu2reurex
blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff there are uniquely two sets fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jun-2023.) (Revised by AV, 1-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreu2reurex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))), wa(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))), wa(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))))))))
  anbi2i(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))))))
  2rexbiia(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))))
  2ralbidva(s1, s2, c0, c1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wb(wi(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wi(w1, wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))))
  imbi2i(w1, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))))
  bitri(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqcom(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))

thm opreu2reurex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0)↔(∃!(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, w1))∧ ∃!(s2 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, w1))))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(∃!(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), w0), (∃!(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, w1))∧ ∃!(s2 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, w1))), (∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, w1))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 → < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >)))))), (∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, w1))∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 →(s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))))))))
  anbi2i(∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, w1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 → < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >))))), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 →(s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1)))))))
  2rexbiia(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 → < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >))), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(w1 →(s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1)))))
  2ralbidva(s1, s2, c0, c1, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (w1 → < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >), (w1 →(s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1)))
  a1i(((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)), ((w1 → < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >)↔(w1 →(s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))))
  imbi2i(w1, < hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >, (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1))
  bitri(< hs0, hs1 > = < s1, s2 >, (s1 = hs0 ∧ s2 = hs1), < s1, s2 > = < hs0, hs1 >)
  eqcom(< hs0, hs1 >, < s1, s2 >)
  opth(s1, s2, hs0, hs1)
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  reu3op(s0, s1, s2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  2reu4(s1, s2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.w(w0)

  diff.hs1.w(w1)
}

blocks.name: opreu2reu
blocks.content: If there is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff, then there is a double restricted unique existential qualification fulfilling a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 25-Jun-2023.) (Revised by AV, 2-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreu2reu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s1, c0, wreu(s2, c1, w1)), wa(wreu(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, w1)), wreu(s2, c1, wrex(s1, c0, w1))))
  opreu2reurex(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  2rexreu(s1, s2, c0, c1, w1)
}
